Carmen Soledad; ella tiene 27 años de edad y es soltera; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el trabajo de contadora, ella es propietaria de un estudio contable, donde realiza su carrera profesional, la socia quiere implementar su oficina. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar implementos para su oficina de contabilidad.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Carmen Soledad belongs to the Hatun Rumiyoc Communal Bank.  This bank is located in the Cusco district, Cusco province, Cusco department.

She is 27 years old and single.  She alternates her daily activities with her accounting work.  She is the proprietor of an accounting office, where she works in her professional career.  She wants to equip her office.  She wants the loan to buy implements for her accounting office.

She is happy about the loan, and she pledges to make her payments in a timely fashion.

loans.use: To buy implements for her accounting office

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy a new minibus

loans.name: Casimira

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal” KANTUS”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Casimira; ella tiene 57 años de edad, casada  y tiene 2 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de compra y venta de madera, la socia tiene su carpintería el cual trabaja conjuntamente con su esposo, a la vez la socia también teje chompas a mano esta actividad ella lo realiza a 
pedido y desde su casa, la socia es una persona bien alegre y optimista con muchas ganas de salir adelante.

La socia solicita el préstamo para la compra de más mercadería para su carpintería como madera y también para comprar algo de lana ya que tiene pendiente algunas chompas.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Casimira is a member of the "Kantus" community bank.  The bank is located in Cusco.

Casimira is 57 years old, married, and has two children.  She has various activities, including buying and selling wood (she has a carpentry business where she works together with her husband) and hand-making sweaters to order from her home.  She is a happy and optimistic person who wants to get ahead. 

She is seeking a loan to buy more merchandise for carpentry, such as wood, and to buy wool for some sweaters that have been ordered.  She is grateful for the loan and promises to make her payments on time.

loans.use: To purchase merchandise for carpentry, such as wood, as well as wool to make sweaters

loans.name: Mario Ricardo

texts.es:
Mario, reside en San Buena ventura, departamento de Usulután, tiene 39 años de edad, vive con su madre, hermanos y 2 hijos de 8 y 6 años, él es empleado trabaja como profesor del centro escolar de Mercedes Umaña lugar cercano a donde vive, esta desde hace 8 años trabajando de lunes a viernes.
Actualmente tiene planeado remodelar su vivienda, mejorando una habitación para realizarlo solicita un préstamo y utilizarlo en láminas, madera, clavos, alambres y pintura, esta inversión le ayudara tanto al Mario como a su familia, pues la tener una nueva habitación estará dando más espacio a sus familiares para que estén cómodos.
Sus propósitos son trabajar por tener una vivienda en mejores condiciones, además proveer para sus hijos lo necesario en salud, alimentación y educación.
texts.en:
Mario, 39, lives in San Buena Ventura, department of Usulután. He lives with his mother, siblings, and two children (ages 8 and 6 years old). He works as a teacher at the Mercedes Umaña education center, which is located near his home. He has been working there, Monday to Friday, for eight years.

He is currently planning to remodel his home by adding a bedroom and has requested a loan in order to do so. He will spend the loan on siding, wood, nails, wire, and paint. This investment will help both Mario and his family, since they will have a new room to provide more space, allowing the family to be more comfortable.

Mario intends to keep working to improve the conditions of his home and to provide his children with the necessities of health, nutrition, and education.

loans.use: to buy construction materials: siding, wood, nails, wire, and paint

loans.name: Ysabel

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal” KANTUS”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Isabel; ella tiene 65 años de edad, separada  y tiene 4 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con su negocio de alquiler de equipos de sonido para cualquier tipo de ceremonia ,la socia cuenta también con un local que lo alquila a diferentes compromisos como matrimonios,bautizos,fiestas de 15 años  fiestas de promoción entre otros más , la socia se siente feliz ya que mediante sus negocios ella saca adelante a su familia y esto es algo que la pone muy contenta y desea continuar así.

La socia solicita el préstamo para la implementación de su salón de eventos para así poder tenerlo más equipado para los compromisos que le soliciten.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member is part of the Communal Bank “Kantus” which is located in the District of Cusco, Providence of Cusco in the Department of Cusco.

Mrs. Isabel is 65 years old, separated and has 4 children. She alternates her daily activities with her business. She rents sound equipments for different ceremonies and she also has a room for events which she rents for social gatherings like weddings, baptisms, birthdays and promotions among others. Mrs. Isabel feels very happy because through her business she has been able to provide for her children and she wishes to be able to continue doing so.

The member requests a loan to better equip her room for events which would allow her to offer better service. She is pleased with the loan and commits to pay the installments in a timely manner.

loans.use: to equip her room for events which would allow her to offer better service.

loans.name: Armen

texts.en:
Armen M. trades in hats, gloves and underwear. To be financially secure and ensure a stable income for himself and his family Armen, an economist by profession, started up this business six years ago. 

Currently, Armen rents out three trading spots at a busy metro underground market. As the cold weather is not over yet, Armen needs to bring in more stock. 

Armen also takes care of his retired parents who live in the same household.

loans.use: To buy hats, gloves and underwear for resale

loans.name: Rosa Del Carmen

texts.es:
Rosa, de 29 años de edad, reside en Chinameca departamento de San Miguel, vive con su esposo y dos hijas de 2 y 8 años de edad, ella se dedica a vender cosméticos y lociones, trabaja de lunes a sábado, actualmente está solicitando un préstamo para comprar mercadería como cremas, lociones, labiales, bases de maquillaje, shampoo. 
Esta compra le ayudara a disponer de suficientes productos para comercializar, ofrecer a los y las clientes productos de calidad, esperando sean aceptados y comprados por estos.
Su aspiración es que a través del negocio pueda sacar a sus hijos adelante, que se preparen con los estudios, así también estabilizar su situación económica.
texts.en:
Rosa, 29, lives in Chinameca in the department of San Miguel. She lives with her husband and two daughters who are 2 and 8 years old. She sells cosmetics and lotions, working from Monday to Saturday. She is requesting a loan at this time in order to buy merchandise like creams, lotions, lipstick, makeup bases, and shampoo.

This purchase will help her have enough products to sell, so she can offer her customers quality products that she hopes they will like and buy.

Her hope is that, through this business, she will be able to help her children get ahead by preparing them for their studies. She also hopes to be able to stabilize their economic situation.

loans.use: to buy creams, lotions, lipstick, makeup bases, and shampoo

loans.name: Dominique

texts.en:
Dominique H. is a jovial 27 year old who is unmarried. He has owned a mini print shop for the past two years and employs three other people. The shop is open from 7 AM to 6 PM.
 
With this loan, Dominique will buy some additional equipment for his shop, specifically a laser jet color printer.

loans.use: To buy a laser jet color printer

loans.name: Martina Isabel Del Carmen

texts.es:
Doña Martina, reside en Chinameca departamento de San Miguel, tiene 47 años de edad,  es madre soltera de una hija con la cual vive, tiene 26 años esta también es madre de un hijo de 2 años de edad.
Doña Martina se dedica a vender ropa, este negocio lo atiende de lunes a domingo, desde hace 4 años, es la fuente de ingreso con la que cuenta para ayudar a su hija y nieto, también logra cubrir sus necesidades y pagos de servicios mensuales. Ella está solicitando un préstamo para invertirlo en ropa específicamente en blusas, pantalones, short y ropa interior. 
Con esta inversión intenta atraer  a nuevos clientes y ofrecerles lo necesario en prendas de vestir, contando con su preferencia espera crecer y ampliar el negocio. Su aspiración es ser una comerciante en grande, con un buen número de clientes, que su negocio sea competente y le brinde buenas ganancias.
texts.en:
Ms. Martina, 47, lives in Chinameca, in the department of San Miguel. She is the single mother of a 26 year-old daughter who lives with her. Her daughter also has a son who is two years old.

Ms. Martina has been selling clothing for the last four years. She tends to her business from Monday to Sunday. It is the source of income that she counts on to support her daughter and grandson, as well as to cover her own needs and to pay for monthly services. She is requesting this loan to invest in clothing, specifically blouses, pants, shorts, and undergarments.

She hopes this loan will help her bring in new customers and to offer them the garments they need. By gaining their preference, she hopes to grow and expand her business. Her dream is to be a big merchant with a good number of customers, and for her business to be competitive and to bring in good profits.

loans.use: to buy blouses, pants, shorts, and undergarments

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To develop her cooked rice business by buying cooking ingredients in bulk

loans.name: Eunice Maria

texts.es:
Eunice es madre tres hijos, casada, con un trabajo fijo en aduanas desde hace varios años, logrando apoyar a su familia, contando con el apoyo de su esposo quien labora como conductor.
Durante estos siete ciclos en Afodenic, ha venido haciendo mejora a su vivienda que gracias a los plazos ha sido posible pagar en tiempo y forma. Para mantener su récor,  con el crédito anterior logro levantar la cocina, pero no logro terminar lo que seguirá haciendo con este nuevo préstamo, terminación de paredes, y terminación del lava manos, lo cual está contenta ya que podrá estar en mejores condiciones en su cocina junto  a su familia.
texts.en:
Eunice is the mother of three children.  She is married with regular work in customs for several years, managing to support her family along with the support of her husband who works as a driver. 
During her past seven loan cycles with  Afodenic, she has been making improvements to her home, which, thanks to the terms she has been able to pay on time.  To maintain her record with the last loan she was able to raise the kitchen, but she was not able to finish.  With this new loan she will continue working to finish the walls and the sink.  She is happy now that she can be with her family in her kitchen that is in better condition.

loans.use: To buy materials to finish the walls and sink for her kitchen

loans.name: Simón

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “UNION FUERZA Y AMISTAD”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Simón; el tiene 63 años de edad y es casado y tiene 6 hijos; el socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de compra y venta de calzados el viaja hasta la ciudad de Arequipa para comprar más mercadería y así poder distribuirlo a sus clientes que le solicitan, el trabaja de forma ambulatoria a la vez el socio hace zapatos para damas el trabaja a pedido también realiza lo que es artesanía haciendo monederos para venderlos a sus clientes el socio es una persona bien alegre y optimista y son estas las actividades que realiza el socio para sacar a su familia adelante.

El socio solicita el préstamo para la compra de más mercadería para su negocio de compra de zapatos y para comprar materiales para la realización de sus zapatos y monederos.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos
texts.en:
Simón is a member of the communal bank, “Union Fuerza y Amistad” ("Unity, Strength and Friendship"). The bank is located in the district of Cusco in Cusco province, department of Cusco.

Simón is a 63-year-old married father of six. He divides his time between his daily activities and his business buying and selling footwear. He travels to the city of Arequipa to buy more merchandise so that he can fill his customer's requests. He also works as a street vendor. Simón makes custom order shoes for women. Additionally, he makes handicrafts such as coin purses in order to sell them to his customers.

Simón is a happy and optimistic person and he works hard to provide a better future for his family. He has requested this loan in order to purchase merchandise for his shoe store and materials for making shoes and coin purses. Simón is grateful for this loan and is committed to making his payments on time.

loans.use: He has requested this loan in order to purchase merchandise for his shoe store as well as materials for making shoes and coin purses.

loans.name: Mary

texts.en:
Mary B. lives in the Kawempe Nabukalu neighborhood in the city of Kampala, Uganda. She is single and has four children and all her children go to school. Mary lives in a home that she rents. She does not have access to electricity or piped water.  Her monthly expense includes food, rent and school fees. 

Mary has a business of selling fruits and vegetables. Besides these vegetables, she also sells Irish and sweet potatoes and cassava at her stall.  She has been in this business for ten years, and she works seven days a week. Mary sells her products at the market.    

Mary has requested a loan of 600,000 Ugandan Shillings from MCDT SACCO, which she will use to buy more boxes of cabbages, onions, oranges and tomatoes.    

The main business challenge for Mary is seasonality and perishability. Her goal for her business is to start going directly to farmers for vegetables.

loans.use: To buy more boxes of cabbages, tomatoes and onions

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Purchase of cedar and Guanacaste wood and glue and nails

loans.name: Carlos Lorenzo

texts.es:
Carlos tiene 20 años de edad, es soltero y  reside junto a su madre en la Ciudad de Dios en el distrito de San José ubicado a 30 minutos de la ciudad de Chiclayo, capital de la Región Lambayeque.

Carlos se dedica a la actividad de carpintería su especialidad es hacer trabajos en melamine para ello cuenta con sus herramientas las cuales ha ido adquiriendo con los ingresos que obtiene de los trabajos que realiza, sus ventas son a pedido para ello cuenta con clientes que lo llaman para que les haga sus  trabajos. El ya tiene cual bien dedicándose a esta actividad desde hace 3 años y gracias a ella solventa los gastos económicos y ayuda a su madre.

Carlos desea comprar su materia prima en este caso melamine y algunas herramientas  de modo que le permita fabricar más productos y satisfacer a sus clientes. Por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar por primera vez a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 500 nuevos soles.

Carlos es una persona bastante conocida y estimada por sus vecinos y clientes, ellos lo consideran alguien responsable y con muchas ganas de salir adelante realizando la actividad que más le gusta.
texts.en:
Carlos is 20 years old, single and lives with his mother. They live in Ciudad de Dios area of the district of San José, which is 30 minutes from Chiclayo, the capital city of the Lambayeque region.

Carlos is a carpenter. He specializes in working with melamine, using certain tools which he bought over time with the money he earned from his work. He makes custom order pieces and this is why his customers call him to do projects for them. Carlos has been in this business for three years now and thanks to his work, he has been able to cover his financial needs and help out his mother.

Carlos would like to purchase raw materials, melamine in this case, and a few tools so that he can make more products and keep his customers happy. This is what led him to request his first loan from Edpyme Alternativa in the amount of 500 Peruvian nuevos soles.

Carlos is fairly well-known and well-respected by his neighbors and customers. They feel that he is a responsible person who is really motivated to keep moving forward with the work he enjoys so much.

loans.use: Purchase of raw materials

loans.name: Alexander

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “HATUN RUMIYOC”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Alexander; el tiene 28 años de edad y es soltero; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de servicio de taxi y también brinda servicio de movilidad escolar, el socio tiene un carro y trabaja desde las 6:00 a.m hasta las 8:00 p.m, por medio de este trabajo quiere salir adelante, el socio quiere mejorar el servicio de taxi y movilidad que brinda al público en general y escolares. El  socio solicita el préstamo para el mantenimiento de su carro.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member is part of Hatun Rumiyoc Communal Bank which is located in the District of Cusco, Providence of Cusco in the Department of Cusco.

The member is Mr. Alexander, he is 28 years old and single. He alternates his daily activities with his taxi service and also provides transportation for school students. Mr. Alexander has a car, works from 6:00am to 8:00pm and hopes to get ahead through his work. He wishes to improve the service he provides to costumers in general and to the students. He requests the loan for maintenance of his vehicle.

The member is very happy with the loan and commits to pay the correspondent installments.

loans.use: The member requests the loan for maintenance of his vehicle.

loans.name: Solange

texts.en:
Solange is 28 years old, married, and has one child.  She works as a secretary but also has a well-organized shop where she performs secretarial services. Three years ago, she opened this business due to her interest in it. Her shop is open from 7AM until 8PM daily except for Sunday, and employs two other persons. 

With this loan, Solange intends to purchase an additional computer and printer. She will save any additional profits she earns after the loan is paid off.

loans.use: To purchase an additional computer and printer.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy ingredients: potatoes, ham, cabbage, spices

loans.name: Juan Jose

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “HATUN RUMIYOC”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Juan Jose; el tiene 31 años de edad y es soltero; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de tienda de multiservicios donde se realizan fotocopias, anillados y otros servicios, el socio también trabaja en una ong,el socio quiere ampliar el negocio de multiservicios.  El  socio solicita el préstamo para el comprar materiales  como papel para la tienda de multiservicios

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the "Hatun Rumiyoc" community bank, located in Cusco district in the province and department of Cusco.

His name is Juan Jose; he is 31 years old and single. He divides his time between his two businesses. One is a photocopy and print shop, which makes photocopies, plastic spiral-bound booklets, and other products. Juan Jose also works for a non-profit organization. He hopes to expand his photocopy and print shop and is requesting a loan to buy materials such as paper.

Juan Jose is very happy to have this loan and is committed to repaying it.

loans.use: Purchase of materials such as paper for photocopy and printing business.

loans.name: Juan Cancio

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “UNION FUERZA Y AMISTAD”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Juan; el tiene 57 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 2 hijos; el socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de repuestos para autos su negocio se encuentra ubicado en su misma casa el socio trabaja conjuntamente con su pareja ya que a la vez también cuenta con un taller de de mecánica siendo el socio quien se ocupa de este negocio, el socio es una persona bien alegre y con muchas ganas de salir adelante por su familia. 

El socio solicita el préstamo para la compra de más mercadería para su tienda de repuestos como accesorios de autos alfombas, siliconas, espejos entre otros más.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos
texts.en:
Juan is a member of the 'Unión Fuerza y Amistad' (Unity, Strength and Friendship) community bank which is located in Cusco district, in Cusco province and department.

Juan is 57 years old and lives with his partner.  He has 2 children.  He divides his time between his daily activities and his business selling car parts.  His business is located in his home.  Juan works together with his partner since he also has a car workshop and he takes care of that business.  Juan is a very cheerful person who has a great desire to get his family ahead in life.

Juan is requesting this loan to buy more merchandise for his car parts store such as accessories: mats, silicone oils, mirrors, and other products.  He is happy to be receiving the loan and pledges to make his repayments on time.

loans.use: To buy more merchandise for his car parts store such as accessories: mats, silicone oils, mirrors and other products

loans.name: Beeda

texts.en:
Beeda N. lives in the Mugowa Zone of Bwaise in the city of Kampala, Uganda.  She is married and has six children, and all her children go to school.  She also takes care of orphans. Beeda has a business of selling green bananas (matooke), a Ugandan plantain dish.  She has been in this business for a few months and she works six days out of every week. She sells her products at the market. 

Beeda has requested a loan of 700,000 UGX from MCDT SACCO, which she will use to buy more bunches of bananas to resell. Her main business challenge is seasonality. She lives in a home that she rents. She has access to electricity but not to piped water.  Her major monthly expenses include rent and school fees.

She is hoping to improve her standard of living and also to start going to farmers directly.

loans.use: To buy more bunches of bananas to sell

loans.name: Maria Jesus

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “HATUN RUMIYOC”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Maria Jesus; ella tiene 38 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 1 hijo; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de pollería y quinta restaurant, ella tiene estos dos pequeños negocios la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de pollería y quinta restaurant. La socia solicita el préstamo para su salud.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This member belongs to "Hatun Rumiyoc" community bank, located in Cusco district in the province and department of Cusco. Her name is Maria Jesus; she is 38 years old and lives with her partner and 1-year old son. Maria Jesus has a poultry store and country-style restaurant. She uses the income from these small businesses to support her family and hopes to expand and improve them. 

Maria Jesus is requesting a loan for health reasons. She is happy to have the loan and is committed to repaying it.

loans.use: Health purposes.

loans.name: Abaticumugandi Group

texts.en:
Daphrose is 32 years old and married with three children between the ages of 3 and 8.  She is the leader of the group 'Abaticumugandi'. 

In the photo, Daphorose is on the right side.  Most of the members are involved in selling pineapples.  Daphrose has been doing this for two years and employs one other person to help her.  Her shop is open from 6am until 9pm every day of the week.

Daphrose has requested this loan to improve her business facilities.  Any profits made from these improvements will be reinvested in her shop.

loans.use: To improve her business facilities.

loans.name: Santos Roberto

texts.es:
Don Santos de 48 años de edad, reside en Ozatlan, departamento de Usulután, posee una tienda, y vive con su esposa y sus dos hijos de 18 y 10 años de edad, actualmente depende de él. El negocio de don Santos es una tienda, que la administra hace 10 años, no tiene un horario fijo porque está ubicada en su propia casa.
Por el momento solicita un préstamo para comprar mercadería para el negocio como: arroz, frijoles, aceite, azúcar, pan, embutidos, entre otros que son necesarios para ofrecer a los clientes, pues estos productos a diario son consumidos en los hogares.
El desea ampliar el negocio, contar con mayores ventas e ingresos, para vivir de una manera mas cómoda con su familia y garantizar el bienestar por un largo plazo a su hogar.
texts.en:
Don Santos is 48 years old and lives in Ozatlan in the department of Usulután. He owns a store and lives with his wife and their two children, ages 18 and 10. Don Santos has run his store for ten years. It has flexible hours of operation because it is located in his house.

Don Santos is requesting a loan to buy merchandise to stock his business with his customers' daily needs, such as rice, beans, oil, sugar, bread, and sausages, among other things. He hopes to expand his store in order to increase sales and income. The extra income will allow him to improve his family's quality of life and to keep his home well-maintained.

loans.use: Purchase of rice, beans, oil, sugar, bread and sausages.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “HATUN RUMIYOC”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Luis Alberto; el tiene 48 años de edad y es soltero y tiene 1 hijo; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de compra y venta de repuestos de carro, el vende en forma independiente y también trabaja como cheff en un restaurant, el socio quiere ampliar el negocio de compra y venta de repuestos de carros.  El  socio solicita el préstamo para uso personal.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Luis Alberto is a member of the "HATUN RUMIYOC" community bank which is located in Cusco district, in Cusco province and department.

Luis Alberto is 48 years old, single, and has one child.  He divides his time between his daily activities and his business buying and selling car parts.  He makes his sales independently and also works as a chef in a restaurant.  He would like to expand his business buying and selling car parts.  He is requesting this loan for personal use.

Luis Alberto is happy to be receiving this loan and pledges to make his repayments on time.

loans.use: Personal use

loans.name: Temtemneh Group

texts.en:
John T. is the leader of this group of entrepreneurs. John was born in Makomp village about 44 years ago. He is married and has eight children. Six of John’s children are attending primary and secondary schools, and two are not yet of school-going age. For fifteen years now, John has been selling palm-oil (the most popular cooking oil), gari (fast food made out of cassava roots), rice and slippers. 

Members of the Temtemneh group are requesting a loan of 1,200,000 SLL for each in the group from SMT/Kiva lenders. With the help of this loan, they will be able to expand their businesses, make more sales and consequently improve on their living conditions. John T. will use his share of the loan to expand his business. He will buy the above-mentioned items at wholesale prices to add to his current stock.

loans.use: To buy more palm-oil, gari, rice and slippers to sell

loans.name: Leoncio

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “UNION FUERZA Y AMISTAD”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Leoncio; el tiene 44 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 3 hijos; el socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de compra y venta de carros viejos, metales y todo lo que tenga que ver con chatarrería cosas viejas para luego el venderlos a sus clientes , el socio lleva años en este negocio el cual trabaja conjuntamente con su pareja siendo esta la única actividad que realiza por el momento ,el socio es una persona bien alegre y con muchas ganas de seguir adelante el socio sale en la foto con una de sus hijas.

El socio solicita el préstamo para la compra de más mercadería para su negocio de chatarrería.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos
texts.en:
Leoncio is a member of the "Unión Fuerza y Amistad" community bank which is located in Cusco district, in Cusco province and department.

Leonicio is 44 years old and lives with his partner.  He has three children.  He divides his time between his daily activities and his business buying and selling old cars and scrap metal.  His business is a scrapyard and he sells old things to his customers.  Leonicio has been in this business for years and he works together with his partner.  This is the only business activity he carries out at the moment.  Leonicio is a very cheerful person who has a great desire to get ahead in life.  He appears in this photo with one of his daughters.

Leonicio is requesting this loan to buy more merchandise for his scrap business.  He is happy to be receiving the loan and he pledges to make his repayments on time.

loans.use: To buy more merchandise for his scrap business

loans.name: Yao  Efuaboe

texts.fr: Monsieur Yao habite quartier Batomé et est marié.  Il fait la production de sachets  pharmaceutiques.  IL s’approvisionne à Accra au Ghana et compte 2 déjà dans cette activité.  Il a son atelier de fabrication à Djidjolé à côté de la pharmacie et  a employé 2 personnes qui l’aident dans ces activités. Il  sollicite de WAGES un prêt pour acheter  3 rouleaux de film d’emballage  de 100 kg et 2 rouleaux de film d’emballage de 40 kg.
texts.en:
Mr. Yao is a married man who lives in the Batomé district. He manufactures pharmaceutical bags. He gets his supplies in Accra, Ghana, and already has two years of experience in this activity. His workshop is located in Djidjolé, next to the pharmacy, and he has two employees to assist him.

He is seeking a loan from WAGES to purchase three 100 kg rolls of packaging film and two 40 kg rolls of packaging film.

loans.use: Purchase of packaging film

loans.name: Celedonio

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “HATUN RUMIYOC”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Celedonio; el tiene 44 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 3 hijos; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el servicio de taxi, el socio hace servicio en las diferentes calles del Cusco, el trabaja desde las 6:00 a.m hasta las 8:00 p.m, el socio quiere mejorar el servicio de taxi.  El  socio solicita el préstamo para comprar repuestos para su carro.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Celedonio is a member of the “HATUN RUMIYOC” community bank which is located in Cusco district, in Cusco province and department.

Celedonio is 44 years old and lives with his partner.  He has 3 children.  He divides his time between his daily activities and his taxi service.  He provides a taxi service in the streets of Cusco, working from 6.00am to 8.00pm.  He would like to improve his taxi service and is requesting this loan to buy spare parts for his vehicle.

Celedonio is happy to be receiving this loan and pledges to make his repayments on time.

loans.use: To buy spare parts for his vehicle

loans.name: Felicien

texts.en:
Felicien is 40 years old and married.  He owns a clean and well-organized animal sales business.  He has been in this business for ten years and is open from as early as 5am until 8pm in the evening.  He employs four people.

Felicien will use the loan to purchase more cows to sell.  He would like to continue to expand and will use any profits he makes for this purpose.

loans.use: To purchase more cows to sales.

loans.name: Marlene Elizabeth

texts.es:
Marlene, de 25 años es una joven dedicada al comercio de calzado y mercería, vive con su esposo y dos hijos de 6 y 4 años de edad, residen en Jucuapa departamento de Usulután;  ella aprendió a vender con su madre hace 8 años, pero actualmente tiene su propio negocio en el mercado municipal, lo atiende de 6:00am a 5:00pm.
Ella solicita un préstamo pues necesita comprar zapatos para la venta como: tenis, sandalias, también juguetes y cosméticos como maquillajes para dama. Ella quiere realizar esta compra porque su compromiso de comerciante es tener siempre para los clientes todo lo necesario en su caso relacionado a calzado, cosméticos y juguetes.
Las aspiraciones de Marlene es cada día fortalecer el negocio, dar excelente atención a los clientes, y contribuir al progreso de su familia, en especial en el de sus hijos.
texts.en:
Marlene is 25 years old.  Her business is selling shoes and sewing supplies.  She lives with her husband and two children, aged 6 and 4, in Jucuapa, in Usulután department.  She learned to sell from her mother 8 years ago and she now has her own business in the town market, where she works from 6.00am to 5.00pm.

Marlene is requesting a loan as she needs to buy shoes to sell such as sneakers and sandals.  She would also like to buy toys and cosmetics such as women's make-up.  She would like to make these purchases because her commitment as a saleswoman is to always have everything available for her customers, in her case this means footwear, cosmetics and toys.

Marlene's aspirations are to strengthen her business every day, to provide her customers with excellent customer service and to contribute to her family's progress, especially that of her children.

loans.use: To buy footwear such as sneakers and sandals.  To buy toys and cosmetics

loans.name: Gloriose

texts.en:
Gloriose, 38, is married with four children, aged two to 13. For three years, Gloriose has owned a large and clean shop where she sells handicrafts, namely wedding decorations. She is a hard worker and has one employee. Her shop is open from 8am to 6pm every day.

Gloriose has requested a loan in order to expand her selection of decorations.

loans.use: To expand her selection of wedding decorations.

loans.name: Federico

texts.es:
Federico es un padre de familia de 57 años de edad, que reside junto a su esposa y a su hijo en el sector Baldera, una zona rural agrícola y ganadera del distrito de San José, el cual se encuentra ubicado a más de 25 minutos de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Se dedica desde hace más de veinte años a la ganadería, él  cría su ganado en el Sector Gallito ubicado en el distrito de  San José asimismo cuenta con algunas vacas de las cuales comercializa a diario la leche que producen entre los vecinos de la zona, y el resto de ganado vacuno lo alimenta para que alcancen un buen nivel desarrollo y comercializarlo entre los negociantes de la zona. Con estos negocios él se encarga de sacar adelante a su familia y de solventar su economía diaria.

Federico desea adquirir alimento balanceado para su ganado y mantenimiento de alfalfa que servirá en un futuro de alimento de ganado. Con una buena alimentación sus animales podrá rendir más leche y esto le permitirá percibir mayores ganancias. Por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1000 nuevos soles.

El es un padre que siempre vela por el bienestar y desarrollo de su familia. Su mayor anhelo es su establo propio.
texts.en:
Federico is a 57 year-old father who lives together with his wife and son in Baldera, a rural, agricultural and livestock-raising area of San José district, more than 25 minutes from the city of Chiclayo.

Federico has been raising livestock for more than twenty years.  He raises his livestock in Gallito, in San José district.  He has some cows whose milk he sells every day to his neighbors.  He feeds the rest of his cattle until they reach a good level of development and then sells them to traders in the area.  Through these businesses, Federico gets his family ahead in life and covers his daily expenses.

Federico would like to acquire balanced animal feed for his cattle and maintain his alfalfa crop that will serve as future feed for his cattle.  With good feed, his animals will be able to produce more milk and this will allow him to make more profit.  For this reason, he is requesting a loan for 1,000 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa.

Federico is a father who is always looking out for his family's well-being and development.  His biggest wish is to own his own cow shed.

loans.use: To acquire balanced animal feed for his cattle

loans.name: Juan Carlos

texts.es:
Juan Carlos trabaja junto a su esposa Mery como costurero en la confección de ropa deportiva, cuya producción lo envía para su venta a la frontera con el Brasil.

El crédito lo destinara para la compra de maquinas de costura recta y una overlok para incrementar su producción por lo tanto sus ventas.

Juan  Carlos vive junto a su esposa en  casa de sus suegros en la zona Villa Tunari de la ciudad de El Alto.


Tiene un pequeño hijo de 5 años de edad

Es el primer crédito con IMPRO y el primero via Kiva, la evaluación realizada lo califica para otorgarle el crédito.
texts.en:
Juan Carlos works together with his wife Mery as a tailor, making sports clothes.  He sends his products to be sold on the Brazilian border.

This loan will be used to buy a regular sewing machine and an overlock machine to increase his production and sales.

Juan Carlos lives with his wife in his in-laws' house which is located in Villa Tunari neighborhood, in the city of El Alto.  He has a 5 year-old son.

This is Juan Carlos' first loan with IMPRO and his first loan via Kiva.  The assessment we carried out qualifies him to receive a loan.

loans.use: To buy a regular sewing machine and an overlock machine for his dressmaking business

loans.name: Arthur

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “HATUN RUMIYOC”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Arthur; el tiene 26 años de edad y es soltero; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el trabajo como docente del nivel secundario y también esta escribiendo un libro de matemáticas para el nivel secundario y universitario, el quiere seguir mejorando en sus estudios como profesor y brindarles mejores conocimientos para sus alumnos.  El  socio solicita el préstamo para comprar materiales para hacer su libro.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Arthur belongs to the Hatun Rumiyoc Communal Bank.  This bank is located in the Cusco district, Cusco province, Cusco department.

Arthur is 26 years old and single.  He alternates his daily activities with his work as a high school teacher.  He is also writing a book about mathematics for the high school and college level.  He wants to continue improving his education as a teacher and to give his students better knowledge.

He is requesting the loan to buy materials to make his book.

He is happy about the loan, and he pledges to make his payments in a timely fashion.

loans.use: To buy materials to make his book

loans.name: Teresa

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal” UNION FUERZA Y AMISTAD”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito D. Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia D. Cusco y departamento D. Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Teresa; ella tiene 55 años D. edad, casada y tiene 3 hijos; La socia tiene su negocio D. tienda D. abarrotes ella venD. productos D. primera necesidad como arroz, azúcar y leche también venD. golosinas,fideos,gaseosas entre otros productos más a la vez la socia también venD. productos D. belleza como cremas, colonias, perfumes entre otros más D. las líneas Avon,Unique y Dupre la socia está feliz con sus negocios ya que mediante estas actividades ella pueD. estar más tiempo con sus hijos.

La socia solicita el préstamo para la compra D. más mercadería para sus negocios.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos D. su cuota.
texts.en:
Teresa belongs to the “Union Fuerza Y Amistad” (Unity, Strength, and Friendship) Communal Bank.  This bank is located in the Cusco district, Cusco province, Cusco department.

Teresa is 55 years old, married, and has three children.  Her business is a grocery store.  She sells basic needs items like rice, sugar, and milk.  She also sells sweets, noodles, and soft drinks, among other products.  She also sells beauty products like creams, cologne, and perfume, among others from the Avon, Unique, and Dupre lines.  She is happy with her businesses.  Through these business activities she is able to spend more time with her children.

She is requesting the loan to buy more merchandise for her businesses.

She is happy about the loan, and she pledges to make her payments in a timely fashion.

loans.use: To buy more merchandise for her businesses

loans.name: Virgen Asunta Group

texts.es:
Margot  pertenece  al banco comunal “Virgen Asunta” y en la fotografía Margot  está parada y levantando la mano, ella representa a su banco comunal, nació en la ciudad D. Calca, tiene 45 años D. edad, es casada y fruto D. esta unión tiene tres hijos. Actualmente, Margot vive en la comunidad D. Hospitalpampa que encuentra ubicada a 10 minutos D. la plaza principal D. la ciudad D. Anta, Cusco- Perú.  Margot tiene una pequeña tienda en su domicilio, ella abre la tienda a las 5:30 D. la mañana y cierra a las 9 D. la noche todos los días. Margot  nos cuenta que también venD. y compra ganado los días viernes en la feria sabatina D. “Tablada” D. la ciudad D. Intiquilla. Margot  requiere el préstamo para comprar más comestibles como por ejemplo azúcar, fideos, arroz y muchas cosas más.  

Su actividad económica D. algunos D. los socios es por ejemplos; venta D. comida, venta D. comestibles, venta D. leña, venta D. granos secos, venta y fabricación D. bloquetas para construcción D. casas, venta D. verduras, venta D. ganado y crianza D. animales menores en cambio otros brindan servicios como por ejemplo transportes rural, empleados en la municipalidad y construcción D. casas. 
       
El banco comunal “Virgen Asunta” ya tiene 6 años D. funcionamiento y está conformado por 13 socios. Los socios son trabajadores y emprendedores que buscan a cada momento las oportunidades para salir adelante y con su esfuerzo diario entregar un mejor futuro a sus hijos. Las reuniones del banco comunal son cada treinta días en la  en la casa D. la socia Margot en la comunidad D. Hospitalpampa.
texts.en:
Margot belongs to the Virgen Asunta Communal Bank.  In the photo Margo is standing and raising her hand.  She represents her communal bank.  She was born in the city of Calca.  She is 45 years old, married, and has three children.  Margot currently lives in the Hospitalpampa community, which is ten minutes from the main plaza in the city of Anta, Cusco-Peru.

Margot has a small store in her home.  She opens the store at 5:30 in the morning, and she closes at 9:00 at night every day.  Margot tells us that she also buys and sells livestock on Fridays at the Sabatina D. Tablada Fair in the city of Iniquilla.

Margot needs the loan to buy more food like sugar, noodles, rice, and much more.

Examples of the business activities of some of the members are selling food, selling groceries, selling firewood, selling dried grains, making blocks for home construction, selling vegetables, and selling livestock and raising small animals.  On the other hand, some of them proviD. services like rural transportation, working for the municipality, and building houses.

The Vigen Asunta Communal bank has been functioning for six years.  It is comprised of 13 members.  The members are hard-working and enterprising.  Every minute of the day they look for opportunities to get ahead. With daily effort they look to give their children a better future.

The meetings of the communal bank are every 30 days in Margo’s house in the Hospitalpampa community.

loans.use: To buy more food like sugar, noodles, rice, and many others

loans.name: Joseline Patricia

texts.es:
Joseline, tiene 25 años de edad, vive junto a sus padres, está soltera, residen en San Miguel departamento de San Miguel, se dedica a la compra y venta de cosmético y ropa.
Ella fundo este negocio hace 5 años, su madre la apoyo para iniciarlo ya que tiene experiencia en el negocio, trabaja todos los días de 7:00am a 4:00pm, por el momento está solicitando un préstamo para  comprar mercadería, cosméticos, cremas, lociones y ropa para el negocio, esta inversión le ayudara muchísimo, pues Joseline no quiere descuidar su negocio y piensa contar con el por un largo tiempo, ya que de acá logra tener sus propios ingresos.
El objetivo primordial de Joseline es tener un negocio rentable, capaz de atender las exigencias de los clientes, además cubrir los gastos familiares.
texts.en:
Joseline is 25 years old, and she lives with her parents.  She is single, and she lives in the San Miguel department of San Miguel.  She buys and sells cosmetics and clothes.

She founded this business five years ago.  Her mother helped her start it because her mother has experience in the business.  She works every day from 7:00 a.m. until 4:00 p.m.  She is now requesting a loan to buy merchandise like cosmetics, creams, and lotions.  She will also buy clothes for her business.  This investment will help her a great deal.

Joseline does not want to neglect her business.  She plans on having it for a long time.  The business is where she manages to get her own income.

Joseline’s prime objective is to have a profitable business that is capable of taking care of her customers’ demands and covers the family’s expenses.

loans.use: To buy cosmetics, creams, lotions, and clothes for her business

loans.name: Abra  Delali

texts.fr: Madame  Abra fait le commerce de produit d’alimentation. Cette activité lui permet de contribuer  financièrement aux besoins  de ses  2 enfants. Elle a débuté en 1990 l’activité et s’approvisionne au grand marché de  Lomé.  Ensuite elle revend  les  produits au  marché  local d’adidogomé.  Elle  a 35  ans et est mariée. Elle est née en Côte d’Ivoire  et habite adidogomé. Pour augmenter son commerce, elle sollicite un prêt pour acheter 2 cartons de tomate, 5 sacs de riz et 2 cartons de sucre.
texts.en: Ms. Abra runs a grocery business. This activity allows her to financially support her two children. She began in 1990 and she buys her supplies at the Lomé Grand Market. She resells the goods at local market in Adidogomé. She is married, she was born 35 years ago in the Ivory Coast and lives Adidogomé. To improve her business, she is requesting a loan to buy two boxes of tomatoes, five bags of rice and two boxes of sugar.

loans.use: Purchase of groceries

loans.name: Tres Marias Group

texts.es:
Valentina pertenece  al banco comunal “Tres Marias" y en la fotografía Valentina está sentada y levantando la mano, ella representa a su banco comunal, tiene 30 años de edad, tiene su pareja y fruto de esta unión tiene un hijo. Su principal actividad económica de Valentina es fabricar o elaborar artesanía, ella tiene su propio taller en su domicilio. Valentina vende a comerciantes minoristas sus productos como por ejemplo llaveros, lapiceros y muchas cosas más. Socia requiere el préstamo para comprar más materiales como mantas, telas, etc.

Su actividad económica de algunos socios es por ejemplos; venta de ropa, venta de comestibles, venta de artesanía, venta de cosméticos, venta de golosinas, venta de leña, venta de comida y venta de cuero. En cambio otros brindarn servicios  como por ejemplo lavado de ropa, empleados de agencias turísticas, realizar llamadas a celulares y representantes de ventas. 
       
El banco comunal “Tres Marias” ya tiene 4 años de funcionamiento y está conformado por 14 socios. Los socios son trabajadores y emprendedores que buscan a cada momento las oportunidades para salir adelante y con su esfuerzo diario entregar un mejor futuro a sus hijos. Las reuniones del banco comunal son cada treinta días en la oficina central de la Asociación Arariwa de la ciudad de Cusco.
texts.en:
Valencia belongs to the Tres Marias Communal Bank.  Valentina is the one in the photograph who is seated and raising her hand.  She represents her communal bank.  She is 30 years old, has a life partner, and has one child.  Valentina’s main economic activity is making handicrafts.  She has a workshop in her home.  Valentina sells her products like key chains, pencil holders, and many others to retailers.  She needs the loan to buy more material like blankets and fabric, etc. 

Examples of the business activities of some of the members are selling clothes, groceries, handicrafts, cosmetics, sweets, firewood, food, and leather.  On the other hand, other members provide services like washing clothes, working for tourist agencies, making cell phone calls, and being sales representatives.

The Tres Marias Communal bank has been functioning for four years, and it is comprised of 14 members.  The members are hard-working and entrepreneurial.  Every minute of the day they are looking for opportunities to get ahead.  With their daily effort they look to give their children a better future.

The communal bank meetings are held every 30 days in the central office of the Asociación Arariwa in the city of Cusco.

loans.use: To buy more materials like blankets, fabric, pencil holders, and many other things

loans.name: Rigoberto

texts.es:
Rigoberto, reside en la Ciudad de San Miguel, es taxista, tiene 28 años de edad, vive con su esposa, aun no tienen hijos.
Él inicio como taxista hace 5 años, compro su propio vehículo y desde entonces labora al servicio de los clientes, con un horario de 5:00am a 7:00pm, actualmente su taxi presenta problemas por lo que él necesita darle mantenimiento y solicita un préstamo para poder realizarlo, con la reparación que se deba hacer al taxi, Rigoberto estará más seguro cuando deba trasladar clientes, además de ofrecer un mejor servicio y la salvedad de que pueda ocurrir un incidente.
Para Rigoberto su fuente de empleo es el taxi por lo que también su objetivo es mantenerlo en las mejores condiciones, ya que de su trabajo mantiene a su familia y cubre los gastos mensuales.
texts.en:
Rigoberto lives in the city of San Miguel; he’s a taxi driver.   He’s 28 years old and lives with his wife; they do not have children yet.

He started out as a taxi driver five years ago.  He bought his own vehicle and since then works providing service to customers on a 5am to 7pm schedule.  Currently his taxi is experiencing mechanical problems so he needs to provide maintenance and is asking for a loan to make the necessary repairs on his taxi.  Rigoberto will then feel more secure while transporting customers both for offering an improved service and for feeling safer from having an accident.

The taxi is Rigoberto’s source of income so his objective is to maintain it in the best possible working conditions since he supports his family and meets monthly expenses through this work.

loans.use: For taxi repairs and purchase of replacement parts.

loans.name: Marisol

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “LA ÑUSTA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Calca, perteneciente a la provincia de Calca y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Marisol; ella tiene 30 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 2 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de flores, ella vende en el mercado de Calca desde las 9:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m, ella tiene un pequeño puesto, la socia quiere terminar de construir su casa, porque debido a las fuertes lluvias que se ocasiono su casa quedo destruida y poco a poco está construyendo. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar materiales de construcción como yeso y cemento.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This lady is a member of "La Ñusta" community bank located in the Calca district, which is part of the province of Calca and the department of Cusco.

Her name is Marisol. She is 30 years old, married and has 2 children. She alternates her daily activities with the business of selling flowers. She has a small stand in the Calca market where she sells from 9:00 am to 5:00 pm.

The lady wants to finish her house construction, because after heavy rains destroyed her house she is gradually rebuilding it. She is requesting a loan to buy construction materials such as gypsum and cement.

Marisol is grateful for the loan and agrees to comply with her payment quotas.

loans.use: The community bank member is requesting a loan to buy construction materials such as gypsum and cement.

loans.name: Rene

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “LA ÑUSTA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Calca, perteneciente a la provincia de Calca y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Rene; el tiene 23 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 1 hijos; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de ropa y de globos ya que se acerca los carnavales, el socio vende llevando a la ciudad de Quillabamba, el socio también trabaja en construcciones, el socio quiere ampliar el negocio de venta de ropa y globos.  El  socio solicita el préstamo para comprar ropa y globos al por mayor.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The partner is a member of the "La Ñusta" communal bank, located in the district of Calca, in the province of Calca, department of Cusco.

The partner is Rene, aged 23 years old, who lives with his partner and has one child. Besides his daily activities he sells clothing and balloons, now that the carnival season is approaching. The partner sells in the city of Quillabamba. He also does some building work. He would like to expand his clothing and balloon selling business. He is requesting a loan to buy  clothes and balloons in bulk.

The partner is happy with the loan and is committed to repaying it as agreed.

loans.use: The partner requests a loan to buy clothes and balloons.

loans.name: Damiana

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “LA ÑUSTA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Calca, perteneciente a la provincia de Calca y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Damiana; ella tiene 44 años de edad y es soltera y tiene 3 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de frutas, la socia vende diferentes frutas como manzanas, naranjas, uvas, platanos y sandias, la socia trabaja desde las 7:00 a.m hasta las 9:00 p.m, por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de venta de frutas. La socia solicita el préstamo para pagar los estudios de sus hijos.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The partner is a member of the "La Ñusta" communal bank ", located in the Calca district in the province of Calca, department of Cusco. 

The partner's name is Damiana. She is 44 years old and single with 3 children. As well as her daily activities she has a fruit selling business. She sells fruits such as apples, oranges, grapes, bananas and watermelons. She works from 7am to 9pm. Thanks to her business she is supporting her children. She would like to expand her fruit selling business. The partner is requesting a loan to pay for her children's education.

She is happy with the loan and is committed to repaying it as agreed.

loans.use: The partner requests a loan to pay for her children's education.

loans.name: Strickers Group

texts.en:
This photo shows the members of “Strickers”, a group of small-scale businesswomen based in Makeni, a city in northern Sierra Leone. This is the first loan these entrepreneurs are accessing from SMT/Kiva lenders. With it, they will be able to expand their businesses, earn more profit and consequently improve their standard of living. 

The leader of this group is Mariatu K.. Mariatu, 29, was born in Yelleh village and currently resides in Makeni with her husband and five children, who attend primary and secondary school. For eight years now, Mariatu has been selling rice and palm oil. With this loan, she will buy them wholesale to add to her business.

loans.use: To buy rice and palm oil for resale.

loans.name: Essi  Enyonam

texts.fr: Madame est née à Danyi  et habite quartier  Djidjolé.  Elle a 29 ans et est mariée avec  2 enfants à sa charge. Pour améliorer les conditions de vie de ses enfants, elle fait la vente de bijoux et les tapettes.   Elle revend ses marchandises  au marché  Adidogomé  et à son domile. Elle s’approvisionne au grand  marché de  Lomé et compte  8 ans dans cette  activité. Elle demande un prêt pour se réapprovisionner.
texts.en:
This lady was born in Danyi and lives in the Djidjolé neighborhood. She is 29 years old and married with two children in her care. 

In order to improve her children’s living conditions, she sells jewelry and flip-flops. She gets her stocks at the Grand market of Lomé and has eight years of experience in this business. She conducts her sales from her home and at the Adidogomé market. 

She is seeking a loan to replenish her stocks of merchandise.

loans.use: To buy jewelry

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Maintenance of his mototaxi.

loans.name: Justina

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “LA ÑUSTA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Calca, perteneciente a la provincia de Calca y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Damiana; ella tiene 25 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 1hijo; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el trabajo de cocinera en un restaurant en el distrito de Calca, ella trabaja desde las 7:00 a.m hasta las 8:00 p.m, por medio de este trabajo la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere seguir mejorando en su trabajo. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar útiles escolares para sus hijos.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Damiana, 25, is a member of the “LA ÑUSTA” (“Princess”) communal bank located in Calca district which belongs to Calca province, Cusco department.

She has a live-in partner and a son.  She alternates her daily chores with working as a cook in a restaurant in Calca district.  She works from 7am until 8pm.  Through this work she is able to support her children.  She wants to continue improving in her work.  She is asking for the loan to buy school supplies for her children.

She is happy with the loan and commits to repay the installments.

loans.use: To buy school supplies for her children.

loans.name: Beline

texts.en:
Beline, 43, is married with two children, aged 15 and 25. Her husband is a driver. For that reason, Beline works hard to provide everything necessary for her family. Beline owns a small business selling various handicrafts and clothes for weddings.

From her ten years of experience, Beline is is seasoned in her business and keeps it well-organized. She employs two people from her community. Her shop is open from 6am to 7pm every day.

Beline has now requested a loan from Kiva lenders via Vision Finance Company in order to expand her business by purchasing more handicrafts and clothes for weddings. She hopes to earn more profit, which will allow her to reinvest in her business.

loans.use: To purchase handicrafts and clothes for resale.

loans.name: Misael

texts.es:
Misael, reside en San Rafael Oriente departamento de San Miguel, tiene 27 años de edad, vive con su esposa y sus dos hijos de 7 y 8 años de edad, se dedica a vender Ropa y Hamacas, este negocio nace por iniciativa propia, hace 6 años, con un horario de 5:00am a 4:00pm todos los días, sus ventas las realiza ambulantes y se transporta en una motocicleta.
Actualmente está solicitando un préstamo para comprar ropa, cubrecamas, hamacas, y más mercadería que a diario ofrece a los clientes, con esta inversión espera que sus ventas mejoren, ya que de este negocio obtiene todo lo necesario para la alimentación de su familia y cubre los gastos mensuales.
Misael tiene como objetivo dedicarse al negocio y mantenerlo con buena mercadería, para contar con la compra de los clientes, también estar al pendiente de su familia.
texts.en:
Misael, 27, lives in San Rafael Oriente, San Miguel department, with his wife and two children who are 7 and 8 years old.  He sells clothes and hammocks.  The business grew from his own initiative six years ago.  He works from 5am until 4pm every day.  He is an itinerant salesman and transports his wares on a motorcycle.

He is asking for a loan to buy clothes, bedspreads, hammocks and more merchandise that he offers customers daily.  With this investment he hopes his sales will improve because he gets everything he needs for his family’s nutrition and to cover monthly expenses from this business.

Misael’s goal is to dedicate himself to the business and maintain it stocked with good merchandise so that he can count on purchases by his customers as well as being watchful of his family.

loans.use: To buy clothing, bedspreads and hammocks.

location.town: San Rafael de Oriente, San Miguel

loans.name: Severina

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “LA ÑUSTA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Calca, perteneciente a la provincia de Calca y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Severina; ella tiene 66 años de edad y es viuda y tiene 9 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de lana, ella vende en el distrito de Calca que queda ubicado a una hora de la ciudad de Cusco, la socia vende diferentes colores de lana, ella trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m,la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de venta de. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar lana de colores al por mayor.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member belongs to “LA ÑUSTA”; Communal Bank located in the district of Calca, province of Calca, department of Cusco.  

Mrs. Severina is a 66 years old widow with 9 children.  She sells wool in the district of Calca which is located an hour from the city of Cusco.  She sells wool in various colors and works from 8:00 AM until 7:00 PM.  She wishes to expand her business and is requesting the loan to purchase wholesale colored wool.

She is happy to be receiving the loan and promises to make her payments on time.

loans.use: The member is requesting the loan to purchase wholesale colored wool.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: working capital

loans.name: Fatsumata

texts.fr: Madame Fatsumata  est mariée et mère de 2 enfants.   Agée de  44 ans, elle contribue au ménage et exerce  comme activité  la coiffure.   Elle  a reçu  plusieurs crédits  de WAGES qu’elle  a parfaitement honoré ces engagements. Elle a commencé en 1997 et  s’approvisionne  au  grand   marché de Lomé. Elle a son salon de coiffure en face du marché Awatamé à Adidogomé.   Elle sollicite  un prêt pour acheter  les produits de coiffure pour satisfaire plus de clients.
texts.en: Mrs Fatsumata, aged 44, is married and the mother of two children. She contributes to household expenses with the income from her hairdresser activity. She had received several loans from the microfinance institution WAGES and she has fully honored her commitments. She began in 1997. She gets her supplies at the great market in Lomé. Her beauty salon is located opposite the Awatamé market in Adidogomé. She applies for a loan to buy styling products to serve more customers.

loans.use: To buy styling products

loans.name: Rodolfo

texts.es:
Don Rodolfo, reside en San Miguel, departamento de San Miguel, tiene 42 años de edad, se dedica a vender ropa, vive con su madre y una hermana, él es soltero y el negocio lo inicio hace 4 años por iniciativa propia, trabaja todos los días de 5:00am a 4:00pm, las ventas las realiza en los pueblos cercanos la Unión y Morazán, donde ya tiene clientela.
Actualmente está solicitando un préstamo para adquirir mercadería como blusas, pantalones, ropa interior y para niños, esta compra necesita realizarla para incrementar el inventario y ver la posibilidad de mejorar también sus ventas.
Él quiere mantenerse en el negocio, apoyar siempre a su madre con los gastos económicos y también los gastos personales.
texts.en:
Rudolfo lives in San Miguel, department of San Miguel with his mother and a sister.   He is 42 years old and unmarried.  He sells clothing, a business he started 4 years on his own initiative.  He works from 5:00 AM until 4:00 PM every day.  He sells his merchandise in the nearby towns of Unión y Morazán, where he has customers.   

Currently, he is requesting a loan to buy merchandise such as blouses, trousers, undergarments, and children’s clothing.  He needs to make this purchase in order to increase inventory and also create the possibility of improving sales.  He wishes to maintain the business, and help his mother with financial obligations and personal expenses.

loans.use: To purchase blouses, trousers, undergarments, and children's clothing.

loans.name: Maria  Isabel

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “LA ÑUSTA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Calca, perteneciente a la provincia de Calca y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Maria Isabel; ella tiene 40 años de edad y es divorciada y tiene 4 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de pollería, ella es propietaria de una pollería, que atiende desde las 5:00 p.m hasta las 11:00 p.m,por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de pollería. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar productos  como pollos y papas.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Sra. Maria Isabel belongs to the Communal Bank “La Ñusta”, which is located in the District and Province of Calca, Department of Cusco.

She is 44 years old, divorced, and has four children. Maria Isabel divides her time between her daily activities and managing her business, a chicken restaurant. She is the owner and manages her restaurant from 5pm to 11pm. Through her business, Maria Isabel is able to help her children get ahead. She wants to expand her restaurant and is requesting a loan to buy ingredients, such as chicken and potatoes.

Maria Isabel is happy with the loan and promises to complete her payments.

loans.use: Purchase ingredients, such as chicken and potatoes

loans.name: Lauriana

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “LA ÑUSTA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Calca, perteneciente a la provincia de Calca y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Lauriana; ella tiene 36 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 3 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de verduras, la socia trabaja en el mercado de Calca, la socia trabaja desde las 6:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,ella también trabaja en la municipalidad de Calca en el área de limpieza, al socia quiere ampliar el negocio de venta de verduras. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar verduras como cebollas, zanahorias, lechuga, tomates y zapallos

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Sra. Lauriana belongs to the Communal Bank “La Ñusta”, which is located in the District and Province of Calca, Department of Cusco.

She is 33 years old, in a common law marriage, and has three children. Lauriana divides her time between her daily activities and her business of selling vegetables at the market in Calca. She works from 6am to 6pm. Lauriana also works in the city of Calca as a housekeeper. She wants to expand her business of selling vegetables and is requesting a loan to buy onions, carrots, lettuce, tomatoes, and pumpkins.

Lauriana is happy with the loan and promises to complete her payments.

loans.use: Purchase onions, carrots, lettuce, tomatoes, and pumpkins

loans.name: Wano

texts.fr: Madame  a 4  enfants  et   est  mariée. Elle est âgée de  35 ans. Elle est née à  Bassar  et habité quartier   Batomé.  Elle fait la vente de bombons  et de charbons de bois mis en sachet.   Elle a commencé l’activité en 2002 et revend à côté de la  pharmacie Djidjolé. Elle a employé  2 personnes qui l’aident dans  ses  activités. Elle demande un prêt  pour  se réapprovisionner.
texts.en: Mrs Wano S., aged 35, is married and the mother of four children. She was born in Bassar and lives now in the neighbourhood of Batomé. She sells sweets and bagged charcoal. She began her activity in 2002 and has her store next to Djidjolé pharmacy. She has hired two employees to help her in her activity. She applies for a loan to stock up her inventory.

loans.use: To buy sweets for her grocery

loans.name: Jose Santos

texts.es:
José, es un joven de 20 años, reside en San Rafael Oriente, departamento de San Miguel, vive con su esposa y una hija de 5 años de edad, se dedica a la venta de medicina y ropa, este negocio lo inicio en ayuda de su hermano, trabaja en lo propio y no tiene horario para realizar las ventas.
El está solicitando un préstamo para comprar ropa y medicinas, ya que con las prendas de vestir debe estar actualizándose con la moda y con los medicamentos debe mantener de aquellos que son más demandados por los clientes.
Sus aspiraciones a futuro son: tener un negocio propio, dar a su familia una mejor condición económica, que su hija estudie y pues que tanto su negocio como el hogar sean prósperos cada día.
texts.en:
José is a young man who is 20 years of age. He resides in San Rafael Oriente in the Department of San Miguel. José lives with his wife and five year old daughter. He sells medicines and clothes, a business that he started with the help of his brother. José works on his own and does not have a set schedule by which he makes his sales.

He is requesting a loan to by clothing and medicines. The clothes he offers are the current fashions and the medicines he keeps in stock are the most demanded by his customers.

His aspirations for the future include having his own shop, providing his family with a better financial situation, and seeing his daughter study so that he will be prosperous each day in both his home and business.

loans.use: Purchase clothing & medicines to sell

location.town: San Rafael de Oriente, San Miguel

loans.name: Pascuala

texts.es:
Pascuala es una madre D. familia D. 39 años D. edad, que resiD. junto a su esposo y a sus dos hijos en la zona rural del caserío Sinchi Roca del distrito D. TambogranD., una zona agrícola situada en la región Piura, a más D. cuatro horas D. la ciudad D. Chiclayo, capital D. la región Lambayeque.

Se dedica a la preparación y venta D. alimentos desD. hace cuatro años, ella prepara sus alimentos en su domicilio para luego ofrecerlos en venta al público en general en un puesto que está ubicado al frente D. una Entidad Financiera. El negocio goza D. muy buena acogida por parte D. sus clientes debido a la buena sazón con la que prepara su comida. Pascuala se vale D. los ingresos que recibe D. esta actividad para ayudar a su esposo a solventar la economía D. su familia.

Pascuala desea ampliar su negocio con la compra D. insumos D. modo que pueda ampliar su producción, ofreciendo variedad D. platos y aumentar sus ventas, por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito D. 500 nuevos soles.
texts.en:
Pascuala is a 39 year old mother who lives with her husband and two children in the rural village of Sinchi Roca in the District of TambogranD.. This farming area is situated in Piura region and located more than four hours away from the city of Chiclayo, the capital of Lambayeque region.

Pascuala has been preparing and selling food for four years. She prepares her dishes at home and later offers them for sale to the general public from a stand located in front of a financial establishment. Her business has earned a good reception because her customers have discovered the good flavor of the food she prepares. Pascuala uses the earnings from her business to help her husband cover the family expenses.

She wants to expand her business by purchasing supplies so that she can increase production, offer a variety of dishes, and increase her sales. For this reason, Pascuala is requesting a loan from Edpyme Alternativa in the amount of 500 PEN.

loans.use: Purchase supplies for her business

loans.name: Avelina

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “LA ÑUSTA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Calca, perteneciente a la provincia de Calca y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Avelina; ella tiene 39 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 3 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de papa, ella vende en el mercado del distrito de Calca, ella trabaja desde las 6:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m, la socia por medio de este negocio saca adelante a sus hijos. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar papa al por mayor.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Sra. Avelina belongs to the Communal Bank “La Ñusta”, which is located in the District and Province of Calca, Department of Cusco.

She is 39 years old, in a common law marriage, and has three children. Avelina divides her time between her daily activities and her business of selling potatoes at the market in the District of Calca. She works from 6am to 5pm. Through this business, Avelina is able to help her children get ahead. The loan she is requesting will be used to buy potatoes in bulk.

Avelina is happy with the loan and promises to complete her payments.

loans.use: Purchase potatoes in bulk

loans.name: Ronald

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “LA ÑUSTA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Calca, perteneciente a la provincia de Calca y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Ronald; el tiene 28 años de edad y es soltero; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de carpintería, el socio hace trabajos en melamina y madera como camas, sillas, mesas entre otros y lo vende en el distrito de Calca, el tiene un taller donde trabaja desde las 9:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m, el socio quiere ahorrar para poder estudiar.  El  socio solicita el préstamo para comprar materiales como madera y melanina.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Sr. Ronald belongs to the Communal Bank “La Ñusta”, which is located in the District and Province of Calca, Department of Cusco.

He is 28 years old and single. Ronald divides his time between his daily activities and his carpentry business. He makes furniture pieces out of melamine (a fire retardant resin) and wood such as beds, chairs, tables, and other items. Ronald sells his products in the District of Calca and has a workshop where he works from 9am to 6pm. He wants to save in order to study and is requesting a loan to buy materials such as wood and melamine.

Ronald is happy with the loan and promises to complete his payments.

loans.use: Purchase materials such as wood and melamine

loans.name: Esther

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal” UNION FUERZA Y AMISTAD”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito D. Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia D. Cusco y departamento D. Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Esther; ella tiene 51 años D. edad, casada y tiene 2 hijos; La socia tiene su negocio D. venta D. ropa para damas, caballeros y niños ella venD. polos,chompas,pantalones,camisas entre otros más ,la socia venD. todas las mañanas en las ferias dominicales del distrito D. San Sebastián, esta es la única actividad que realiza por el momento ya que los demás días se dedica a su casa y ayudarle a su hija mayor en la crianza D. su hija la cual sale en la foto, la socia es una persona bien alegre y con muchas ganas D. salir adelante. 

La socia solicita el préstamo para la compra D. más mercadería para su negocio.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos D. su cuota.
texts.en:
Sra. Esther belongs to the Communal Bank “Union Fuerza Y Amistad” (Union, Strength, and Friendship), which is located in the district, province, and department of Cusco.

She is 51 years old, married, and has two children. Esther has a business selling clothes for women, men, and children. She sells polo shirts, sweaters, trousers, shirts, and many other items. Esther sells at the Sunday fairs in the District of San Sebastián. This is her only business activity at the moment since she dedicates the rest of the week to her household activities and helping her eldest daughter raise her granddaughter (who appears in the photo with her). Esther is a cheerful person who has tremendous desire to succeed. She is requesting a loan to buy more merchandise for her business.

Esther is happy with the loan and promises to complete her payments.

loans.use: Purchase more merchandise for her business

loans.name: Aimee

texts.en:
Aimee, 42, is married with five children between 3 and 16 years old. She owns a small business selling various drugs in her medical clinic.

From her ten years of experience, Aimee is seasoned in her business and keeps it well-organized. She employs four people from her community. Her clinic is open from 7am to 9pm every day.

Aimee has now requested a loan from Kiva lenders via Vision Finance Company in order to expand her business by purchasing more drugs for her medical clinic. She hopes to earn more profit, which will allow her to buy more materials and drugs for her business.

loans.use: To purchase more drugs for her medical clinic.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Purchase composts & fertilizers

loans.name: Akossiwa
