Con este nuevo préstamo de S/.1,500.00 nuevos soles comprará 2 colonias agu, 2 talcos, 3 cremas para mano y cuerpo, una crema para depilar, 3 perfumes para damas, 1 perfume para caballero, 2 colonias refrescantes.
La señorita Diana tiene ganas de crecer en su negocio y espera que todo lo vaya bien y pueda a ayudar a su madre económicamente y poder estar más tranquila.
texts.en:
Diana is a member of the communal bank Mujeres Del 2000 (Women of 2000), in the District of Calleria, Ucayali state. She is 22 years old and single.  She has been working with loans from Manuela Ramos for one year.  These loans have helped her increase her capital.  She sells beauty products through a catalog, such as Esika and others.  Her business is going well because her customers are punctual with their payments.  She just completed her Education degree and is looking for work, but she will continue with her business.  

With this loan of 1,500.00 new soles, she will purchase 2 Agu baby colognes, 2 talcum powders, 3 hand and body creams, one hair removal cream, 3 ladies perfumes, one men's cologne, and 2 refreshing colognes.

Diana wants to grow her business and hopes that everything goes well so that she can help her mother financially and be more relaxed.

loans.use: To purchase 2 Agu baby colognes, 2 talcum powders, 3 hand and body creams, one hair removal cream, 3 ladies perfumes, one men's cologne, and 2 refreshing colognes.

loans.name: Maria Luz

texts.es:
La señora María es socia del banco comunal Mujeres Del 2000, del Distrito de Calleria, departamento de Ucayali, tiene 48 años de edad y tiene 3 hijos.
Ella se dedica a la venta de productos de primera necesidad (abarrotes) y lo realiza en su propia casa, poco a poco ha ido incrementando su negocio en estos diez años que viene trabajando con los préstamos de Manuela Ramos, ha tenido que trabajar para mantener a sus hijos porque no tiene ayuda del padre.
Con este nuevo préstamo de S/.3,000.00 nuevos soles comprará: 1 caja de leche, 1 saco de arroz, 41 saco de azúcar, 1 caja de aceite, 1 caja de conservas, 1 caja de mermelada en sache, 1 caja de mayonesa, 1 caja de mostaza, 1 paquete de fideo, 5 kilos de harina, ½ caja de huevos, 5 paquetes de papel higiénico.
Gracias a su negocio puede pagar la educación de sus hijos y quiere seguir trabajando para poder apoyarlo hasta que terminen sus estudios superiores. Manuela Ramos ha sido de gran ayuda en su vida.
texts.en:
María is a member of the “Mujeres del 2000” (Women of 2000) communal bank in Callería district, Ucayali department.  She’s 48 years old and has three children.

She sells basic need items (groceries) at home.  Gradually she’s been enlarging her business over the ten years she’s been working with Manuela Ramos loans.  She has had to work to support her children because she does not get any help from their father.

With this new 3000 new sol loan she will buy: 1 case of milk, a sack of rice, 41 sacks of sugar, a case of oil, a case of conserves, a case of marmalade in individual packs, a case of mayonnaise, a case of mustard, a package of pasta, 5 kilos of flour, ½ crate of eggs and 5 packages of toilet paper.

Thanks to her business she can pay for her children’s education and she wants to continue working to continue supporting them until they finish their higher education.  Manuela Ramos has been of great help in her life.

loans.use: To buy stock items for her store.

loans.name: Edgar

texts.en:
Edgar is 29 years old and has 3 school-aged children. He works as a truck driver and also transports grains from local mills to sell in forest communities. He will be using his loan of 1,000 nuevos soles to expand his grain-selling business. 

Edgar also works in a hardware store. In the future he would like to open his own store, either in Ayacucho or in the forest communities, to sell supplies. Edgar has been a member of FINCA Peru for 3 years now, and enjoys the business support the organization supplies and its lack of bureaucracy.

loans.use: To purchase grain to resell

loans.name: Hassan

texts.en: Hassan is a 29 year-old single man from Bint Jbeil.  He has worked in furniture painting for 11 years. He opened his own business in 2001.  Hassan is still young and energetic, he can do more than he's doing now, but his financial situation stops him from buying necessary tools for his business. Hassan is requesting a loan from Al Majmoua in order to buy a generator and new tools for his business. This isn't Hassan's first time requesting a loan from Al Majmoua.  His previous loan was helpful and he was a borrower in good standing.  He hopes to expand his business to start manufacturing and painting furniture.

loans.use: To buy a generator and new tools

loans.name: Tierra Fertil 2 & 3 Group

texts.es:
Elizabeth es una D. L. miembros del grupo Tierra fertil 2, 3. Su familia está compuesta por 3 hijos y su esposo, Como familia ambos (L. padres) son muy dedicados y trabajadores, Elizabeth guía a sus hijos por el buen camino, siendo ejemplo para elL.. Nos dice que sus retos o desafíos más difíciles ha sido siempre y sera, apoyar a sus hijos, educarL., y si el Señor se lo permite ayudarles económicamente.

Elizabeth está muy emocionada D. recibir su 4to préstamo en Esperanza Internacional. Siendo siempre muy puntual en sus pagos,. Ella ha tenido su negocio por alrededor D. 5 años, el cual inicio con ahorros que pudo guardar para negociar. Este préstamo sera invertido en la compra D. ropa, como pantalones, faldas, blusas, zapatos. Su principal objetivo con sus beneficios es poder cubrir las necesidades D. su familia, ayudando a su esposo con L. ingresos que ella genera, no obstante tambien sus planes es poder ahorrar para el futuro. 

Vive en unas D. las comunidades D. L. Alcarrizos, una ciudad muy movida, con una alta población, que se desplaza por las calles, creando una ciudad activa, esta ubicada al oeste D. Ciudad D. Santo Domingo e igual que otras ciudades, carece D. muchos servicios básicos.
texts.en:
Elizabeth is a member of the “Tierra Fertil 2, 3” (Fertile Land 2, 3) group.  Her family is composed of her three children and husband.  As a family both (the parents) are very devoted and hard working.  Elizabeth guides her children on the good path being an example for them.  She tells us that her most difficult challenge has been and always will be supporting her children, educating them and, if the Lord allows it, to help them economically.

Elizabeth is very excited about getting her 4th Esperanza Internacional loan.  She is always very punctual with her payment.  She has had her business for about 5 years.  She started it with savings she was able to save to negotiate with.  This loan will be used to buy clothes like: pants, skirts, blouses and shoes.  Her main objective for her profits is to cover family needs, helping her husband with the income she generates, not withstanding that also in her plans is being able to save for the future.

She lives in one of the L. Alcarrizos communities, a very active city with a large population that goes about the streets creating a very busy city.  It is located west of the city of Santo Domingo and, like many other cities, lacks many basic services.

loans.use: For clothes.

loans.name: Maria Carranza

texts.es:
doña Maria Carranza O. tiene 49 años de edad vive en la colonia 7 de mayo de la comunidad de Guasaule, Maria es una mujer emprendedora que se dedica a la compra y venta de naranjas.
Maria es madre de 2 hijos que le ayudan con las ventas de las naranjas.
junto con su esposo han trabajado duro para sacar adelante a sus hijos.
Maria todos los dias se levanta a las 5 de la mañana para salir a vender sus naranjas.
sus tiempos libres se los dedica a su familia.
el credito lo utilizara para la compra de naranjas al por mayor.
esta fruta la vende a varias personas que se dedican a la venta de fresco de naranjas.
texts.en:
Mrs. María Carranza O., 49, lives in the 7 de Mayo neighborhood in the city of Guasaule.  María is an enterprising woman who is an orange merchant.

María has two children that help her sell the oranges.

Together with her husband they have worked hard to raise their children.

María rises daily at 5am to go out selling her oranges.  She devotes her free time to her family.

She will use the loan to buy oranges at wholesale.

She sells this fruit to several people who sell fresh orange juice.

loans.use: To buy oranges.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Erika Yanira

texts.es:
La señora Erika, es socia del banco comunal Vecinas Unidas, del Distrito de Calleria, departamento de Ucayali, tiene 32 años de edad, está casada y tiene un solo hijo.
Lleva recién muy poco tiempo trabajando con los préstamos de Manuela Ramos, ella se dedica a la venta de comida típica de la zona y le está yendo bien porque trabaja solo con pedidos y lo realiza todo en su casa, para su esposo es una gran ayuda porque es una entrada más de dinero a casa.
Con este nuevo préstamo de S/.1,100.00 nuevos soles comprara: 2 cientos de platos descartables, 2 cientos de tenedores descartables, 1 paquete de servilletas, y  1 paquete de bolsa grande.
Estos son las cosas que le faltaban para poder dar mejor atención a sus clientes, seguirá trabajando para mejorar cada día su negocio y también  seguir siendo el apoyo de su pareja.
La señora Erika agradece a Manuela Ramos por el apoyo económico.
texts.en:
Erika is a member of the “Vecinas Unidas” (United Neighbors) communal bank in Callería district, Ucayali department.  She is 32 years old, married and has just one child.  She has only been working with Manuela Ramos loans for a short period of time.

She sells typical dishes from the area and is doing quite well because she works exclusively order based and does all the work at home.  This extra source of income is of great help to her husband.

She will use the new, 1100 new sol, loan to buy: 200 disposable plates, 200 disposable forks, 1 package of napkins and one package of large bags.  These are the items still needed to provide better customer service.  She will continue to work to improve her business every day and also to continue being a support for her spouse.

Erika thanks Manuela Ramos for the economic support.

loans.use: To buy supplies for her food preparation business.

loans.name: Noemi

texts.es:
La señora Noemí es socia del banco comunal Mujeres Del 2000, del Distrito de Calleria, Departamento De Ucayali, tienen 46 años de edad, está casada y tiene 2 hijos menores.
Lleva trabajando con los préstamos de Manuela Ramos desde hace un año, tiene una tienda de lubricantes, como esta ubicada en su misma casa puede alternar con la atención de sus hijos, así puede trabajar más tranquila.

Con este nuevo préstamo de S/. 1,500.00 nuevos soles comprará 3 cajas de aceite móvil, y 1 galón de aceite suelto.
La señora Noemí  piensa seguir implementando su tienda de lubricantes, porque quiere seguir creciendo con su negocio, y quizá más adelante  poder tener una tienda mas, Manuela Ramos podrá darle la oportunidad que necesita para poder hacer sus sueños realidad.
texts.en:
Noemí is a member of the “Mujeres del 2000” (Women of 2000) communal bank in Callería district, Ucayali department.  She is 46 years old, married and has two minor children.

She has been working with Manuela Ramos loans for a year.  She has a vehicle lubricant store.  Because it’s in her own house she can tend to her children simultaneously thus working with more peace of mind.

She will use this new, 1500 new sol, loan to buy 3 cases of Mobil oil and one gallon of bulk oil.

Noemí plans to continue stocking her lubricants store because she wants to continue growing with the business and perhaps later one open a second store.  Manuela Ramos could provide the opportunity she needs to make her dreams a reality.

loans.use: To buy three cases of Mobil oil and 1 gallon of bulk oil.

loans.name: Rubel Eliseo

texts.es: El señor Rubén Eliseo tiene 26 años. el se dedica a ofrecer el servicio de cyber. Hace más de 2 años que se dedica a este negocio, en ese tiempo empezó con un capital pequeño y fue ahorrando poco a poco hasta lograr tener suficiente clientela. El crédito será invertido en la compra de computadoras, mouse, repuestos para computadoras entre otros. Su meta es incrementar la cantidad de maquinas y obtener un poco mas de ganancias.
texts.en: Rubén Eliseo, 26, has an internet service.  More than 2 years ago he started with a little capital and little by little he saved so that he had some customers.  He will use the loan to buy computers, mouse, computer stands, etc.  His goal is to increase the number of computers and have a little more profit.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Ana Rosa

texts.es:
Ana es una joven de 31 años de edad,  soltera, vive junto a sus padres, es una mujer creativa en donde hace un año logro junto a sus hermanos comenzar una pequeña panadería, ya que contaban con la experiencia de un tío.
Con ahorro de su trabajo anterior como ejecutiva de venta en una tienda de ropa inicia, lo que desea hacer es entechar la parte donde está el horno, para lograr mejores condiciones de trabajo ya que el sol le cubre mucho. Lo que comprara materiales de construcción como: laminas de zinc, perlines,  Golosos, y poder cerrar por completo el área del horno para trabajar en mejores condiciones. Todo se está haciendo posible gracias al financiamiento que Afodenic está otorgando.
texts.en:
Ana is a young woman of 31 years who is single and lives with her parents. She is a creative woman in that for the past year she and her siblings managed to begin a small bakery with the help and experience of an uncle.
With savings for her previous job as a sales executive in a clothing shop, what she wants to do is roof in where the oven is to get better work conditions because it will cover a lot of sun. She will buy construction materials such as zinc sheets, Perlin, Golosos, and materials to be able to close the entire oven area so they can work in better conditions. All of what she is doing is possible thanks to the financing she is being given from Afodenic.

loans.use: To buy construction materials to finish closing her oven.

loans.name: Oti Katty

texts.es:
La señora Oti, es socia del banco comunal Mujeres Del 2000 del distrito de Calleria, Departamento de Ucayali, tiene 23 años de edad, está casada y tiene una niña, su esposo es administrador de empresas.
Lleva trabajando con los préstamos de Manuela Ramos desde hace 2 años.  Se dedica  a la publicidad y estampados de polos, en las campañas electorales subieron sus ingresos por la demanda que hubo de los paneles publicitarios y los polos estampados.
Con este nuevo préstamos de S/. 1,200.00 nuevos soles comprará 1 kilo de pintura roja, verde, blanco, amarillo, negro, azul para estampado, 5 bastidores, 5 espátulas, 2 kilos de imprimante, 1 plancha.
Manuela Ramos sabe cómo puede brindar apoyo a sus socias de los bancos comunales, orientandolas para distribuir mejor su dinero y les sirve mucho para poder surgir, mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Oti is a member of the “Mujeres del 2000” (Women of 2000) communal bank in Callería district, Ucayali department.  She is 23 years old, married and has a daughter.  Her husband is a business administrator.

She has been working with Manuela Ramos loans for two years.  She’s in publicity and polo shirt printing.  During the electoral campaigns her income rose due to the demand there was for publicity panels and printed polo shirts.

She will use the new, 1200 new sol, loan to buy 1 kilo each of red, green, white, yellow, black and blue printing ink, 5 frames, 5 spatulas, 2 kilos of fixer and one iron.

Manuela Ramos knows how to provide support for the members of its communal banks teaching them to better distribute their money which is very useful for them to surge forward improving their quality of life.

loans.use: She will buy one kilo each of red, green, white, yellow, black and blue paint for printing, 5 frames, 5 spatulas, 2 kilos of fixer, 1 iron.

loans.name: Rocio Melida

texts.es:
La señora Rocío es socia del banco comunal Vecinas Unidas del Distrito de Calleria, Departamento de Ucayali, tiene 45 años de edad, está casada y tiene 3 hijos menores de edad.
Tiene una bodega que funciona en su propia casa, cuenta con la ayuda de sus hijos para poder atender el negocio.  Su esposo  es trabajador independiente.
Con este nuevo préstamo de S/.1,500.00 nuevos soles comprará: 1 bolsa de fideos para sopa, 1 bolsa de fideo tallarín, 1 bolsa de fideo cabello de ángel, 1 saco de arroz, 1 saco de azúcar, 1 caja de aceite, 3 paquetes de papel higiénico, 1 bolsa de legía, 1 caja de añil para ropa, 1 caja de conservas, 1 caja de aceite de litro.
Todos estos años ha estado trabajando para dar a su  familia lo mejor, para que nada les falte a sus hijos, esto gracias a que ambos trabajan y generan ingresos.
Agradece a Manuela Ramos por darle la oportunidad de poder tener acceso a los créditos y hacer que su vida y la de su familia haya mejorado enormemente.
texts.en:
Rocío is a member of the “Vecinas Unidas” (United Neighbors) communal bank in Callería district, Ucayali department.  She is 45 years old, married and has three minor children.

She has a store operating in her house.  Her children help her tend to it.  Her husband is an independent worker.

With this new, 1500 new sol, loan she will buy: one bag of soup noodles, one bag of thin noodles, one bag of angel hair pasta, one sack of rice, one sack of sugar, a case of oil, three packs of toilet paper, one bag of lye, one box of bluing for clothes, a case of conserves and a case of oil in one liter units.

She’s been working all these years to provide the best for her family, so that her children would lack nothing.  This is thanks to the fact that both work and generate income.

She is grateful to Manuela Ramos for giving her the opportunity to have access to credit and causing her life and that of her family to improve enormously.

loans.use: To buy stock items for her store.

loans.name: Deidis

texts.es:
La señora Deidis es socia del banco comunal Mujeres Del 2000, del Distrito de Calleria, Departamento de Ucayali. Tiene 39 años de edad, está casada y tiene 5 hijos, solo viven con 4 de sus hijos, uno de ellos ya tiene familia.
Se dedica a la venta de refrescos, gelatinas, bebidas gaseosas, por eso cuenta con una refrigeradora, esta actividad la realiza en su misma casa.
Con su nuevo préstamo de S/.1,200.00 nuevos soles comprará 1 paquete de bolsas 3x8, 1 paquete de gelatina de fresa, 1 paquete de gelatina de naranja, 1 paquete de gelatina de piña, 1 paquete de gelatina de menta, 5 colorantes para curiches, 2 embudos, 2 baldes de 5 litros C/u, 25 kilos de azúcar, 3 jabas de gaseosas. 
La señora Deidis trabaja para poder mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia, porque su esposo trabaja como estibador y no gana mucho. Gracais a Manuela Ramos ha podido mejorar la vida de muchas mujeres que no sabían qué hacer para trabajar, porque no contaban con un capital de trabajo ni con la asesoría para iniciar un negocio.
texts.en:
Deidis is a member of the “Mujeres del 2000” (Women of 2000) communal bank in Callería district, Ucayali department.  She is 39 years old, married and has five children, only four of whom still live with her; one of them already has family.

She sells snacks, gelatins and soft drinks and has a refrigerator for this; she runs this business from home.

With the new, 1200 new sol, loan she will buy: 1 package of 3x8 bags, 1 package of strawberry gelatin, 1 package of orange gelatin, 1 package of pineapple gelatin, 1 package of mint gelatin, 5 food colorings for curiches (slushy-like fruit drinks), 2 funnels, 2 5-liter buckets, 25 kilos of sugar and three crates of soft drinks.

Deidis works to improve her family’s quality of life because her husband works as a stevedore and doesn’t earn very much.  Thanks to Manuela Ramos the lives of many women who did not know what to do to work have improved because they had neither working capital nor training to start a business.

loans.use: To buy ingredients and supplies.

loans.name: Claudia Isabel

texts.es:
La señora Claudia es socia del banco comunal Vecina Unidas del Distrito de calleria, Departamento de Ucayali, tiene 31 años de edad, está casada y tiene 2 hijos menores de edad, su esposo se desempeña como motocarrista (transportista).
Ella se dedica a la venta de comidas, principalmente menú y lo hace con ayuda de su hermana.  Esta actividad la realiza solo de lunes a viernes, porque el fin de semana se dedica a su familia, tiene que estar con sus hijos.
Con éste préstamo de S/. 2,000.00 nuevos soles comprará: 3 ollas grandes, un colador de metal, 1 cuchilla de licuadora, 1 tabla de picar, 2 baldes de 25 litros, 2 doc. De jarras de vidrio de medio litro, 1 balón de gas.
Gracias a su negocio puede solventar parte del gasto de su hogar y  de esa manera ayuda a su esposo y pueden disfrutar tranquilos los fines de semana.
"..gracias a Manuela Ramos, por hacer que las mujeres salgan adelante por si solas".
texts.en:
Claudia is a member of the “Vecinas Unidas” (United Neighbors) communal bank in Callería district, Ucayali department.  She is 31 years old, married and has two minor children.  Her husband works as a mototaxi driver (transportation).

She sells meals, especially economic meals with help from her sister.  She works at this activity from Monday through Friday because she devotes the weekend to her family; she has to be with her children.

With this 2000 new sol loan she will buy: 3 large pots, a metal colander, a blender blade, a chopping board, two 25-liter buckets, 2 dozen ½-liter glass jars and one tank of gas.

Thanks to the business she is able to cover part of the household expenses and help her husband so that together they can enjoy the weekends in peace.

“Thanks to Manuela Ramos for making women get ahead on their own.

loans.use: She will buy: 3 large pots, a metal colander, a blender blade, a chopping board, two 25 liter buckets, two dozen ½ liter glass jars, and one gas tank.

loans.name: Miguel

texts.es: Miguel tiene 27 años, vive con su esposa en casa de sus suegros. Hace más de 5 años se dedica a realizar bordados, actividad que lo realiza en su misma casa, y gracias al buen gusto por hacer estos bordados es que muchos de sus clientes siempre le hacen diversos pedidos, quienes a su vez terminan recomendándole con nuevos clientes. De esta manera como es que ha logrado obtener una estabilidad económica, durantes casi todos los meses del año. El arte  que tiene por realizar este trabajo es un punto a su favor, hace que  distinga su trabajo con mucha calidad, por lo que le resulta rentable. Es por esta razón que continuará dedicándose a este trabajo con la proyección de seguir mejorando su negocio con maquinarias. Es su segundo crédito con MFP, esta muy contento de  saber que tiene un apoyo financiero ya que siempre ha demostrado  ser responsable en sus pagos y agradece  a aquellas personas que serán gestoras del préstamo que solicita y le será  muy útil en el progreso de su negocio. Invertirá el crédito en la compra de materiales de construcción para que mejore la infraestructura de su taller de bordados.
texts.en:
Miguel is 27 years old, living with his wife in his in-laws’ house.  For over five years he has done embroidery, an activity he does at home.  Thanks to his preference for making these embroideries he has many customers that place various orders with him and who also end up recommending him to new customers.  This is how he’s managed to attain economic stability during most of the months of the year.

The art he possesses for doing this kind of work is a point in his favor; it makes his work stand out as being of very high quality and this leads to it being very profitable.  For this reason, he plans to continue devoting himself to this work with the future aim of improving his business by mechanizing.

This is his second loan with MFP.  He is very happy to know that he has financial support because he has always shown himself to be responsible with his payments and he’s grateful to all those people who will fund the loan he’s requesting that will be so useful for his business’ progress.

He will use the loan to buy building materials and supplies to improve his embroidery workshop’s infrastructure.

loans.use: To buy building materials and supplies.

loans.name: Sonia Maritza

texts.es:
la señora Sonia Maritza M. B. tiene 47 años de edad, es soltera y se dedica a la venta de productos de uso personal como cremas, lociones, esmaltes, talcos, jabones, tintes para cabello etc.
en estos momentos ya no tiene dependientes porque sus hijos estan grandes y viven en USA.
el credito lo utilizara para la compra mercaderia y zapatos para epoca de escolar, ya que es epoca donde los niños comienzan sus clases y desea comprar al por mayor zapatos y tenis para surtir su negocio y asi de esta manera obtener mejores ganancias las cuales las necesita para cubrir los gastos de su hogar.
texts.en: Sonia Maritza M. Berros, 47, is single and sells personal products such as creams, lotions, nail polish, talcum powder, soaps, hair dye, etc. At this time she has no dependents because her children are grown and live in the United States. The loan will be used to buy merchandise such as school shoes as it's back-to-school time for children. She wants to buy wholesale tennis shoes as a means to improve business and increase her earnings which she needs to cover household expenses.

loans.use: to buy deodorant, creams, perfumes, lotions, body oil, nail polish, nail polish remover, nail cutters, hair dye, Vaseline, hair gel, talcum powder, face soaps, and shoes

loans.name: Luis Alfonso

texts.es: El Sr Luis labora como ayudante Valvulero es soltero  tiene tres personas  a su cargo, es el primer crédito que CEPRODEL le otorga, agradece la oportunidad que le dan con  este  desembolso porque si va a mejor su vivienda con compra de  materiales  de construcción bloque ,hierro, cemento, arena, clavo, estribo para un cuarto en la vivienda y solventar deuda pendiente que tiene.
texts.en: Luis works as an assistant Valve Installer.  He’s single and has three people in his care.  This is the first loan CEPRODEL has granted him.  He is grateful for the opportunity they give him with this disbursement because he will improve his dwelling buying building materials and supplies like: concrete blocks, iron rods, cement, sand, nails and braces for a room and pay off his current debt.

loans.use: To buy building materials and supplies for home improvement.

loans.name: Gladys Vicentina

texts.es:
Gladys es socia del Banco Comunal “Las Collabinas” ubicado en el distrito de Ilave, provincia El Collao y departamento de Puno, tiene 27 años de edad, de estado civil soltera y  tiene 01 hijo.  La señora estudio educación secundaria. 
Viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace un año, su primer préstamo fue de S/. 500.00 nuevos soles, dinero que invirtió en su negocio venta de vidrios.
Con éste préstamo de S/. 2000.00 nuevos soles, comprará media java de vidrios para su negocio.  Gladys trabaja junto con su esposo y hermanos, su esposo también es contador público.
Su sueño es poner una tienda de lavadoras y tienda de plastiqueria.	
Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal es la facilidad con que les otorgan los préstamos.
texts.en:
Gladys is a member of the “Las Collabinas” communal bank located in Ilave district, El Collao province, Puno department.  She’s 27 years old, her marital status is single and she has a son.  She finished middle school.

She has been collaborating with the Manuela Ramos Movement for a year.  Her first loan was for 500 new soles that she used for her glass business.

She will use this, 2000 new sol, loan to buy half a crate of glass for her business.  Gladys works alongside her husband and brothers.  Her husband is also a Public Accountant.

Her dream is to set up a Laundromat and a plastics store.

What she likes about her communal bank is the ease with which loans are granted.

loans.use: To buy glass at wholesale.

loans.name: Rey Antonio

texts.es: El  Sr G.  labora como fontanero es soltero tiene  tres persona a su cargo, es el primer crédito que CEPRODEL le otorga, agradece el apoyo que  brinda esta institución con  este  desembolso para realizar  compra de  materiales  de construcción bloque, cemento, arena, hierro, piedrín, estribo, alambre y pago de mano de obra para hacer un cuarto en su vivienda.
texts.en: Sr. G. works as a plumber.  He is single and has three people under his care.  This is the first loan he has received from CEPRODEL.  He is grateful for the support that CEPRODEL has provided so that he can buy construction materials such as blocks, cement, sand, iron, gravel, brackets, and wire.  Rey Antonio will also pay for labor in order to build a room in his home.

loans.use: Purchase construction materials & pay for labor to build a room in his home

loans.name: Graciela

texts.es:
Graciela es socia del Banco Comunal “Las Collabinas” ubicado en el distrito de Ilave, provincia El Collao y departamento de Puno, tiene 31 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente y tiene un hijo.  Estudió educación superior. 
Su primer préstamo solicitado que fue de S/.500.00 nuevos soles, lo invirtió en su negocio de venta de celulares, cosméticos y manualidades. Trabaja con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace un año.
Con éste préstamo de S/. 1500.00 nuevos soles, comprará cinco celulares, ella trabaja con sus ayudantes y su esposo trabaja en el municipio.
Su sueño a futuro es aumentar la mercadería y mejorar su tienda.	
Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal son las reuniones y las capacitaciones que recibe
texts.en:
Graciela is a member of the Communal Bank “Las Collabinas” which is located in the District of Ilave, El Collao Province, Department of Puno. She is 31 years old, in a common law marriage, and has one child. Graciela studied for her higher education.

The first loan she requested was in the amount of 500 PEN and was invested in her business of selling mobile phones, cosmetics, and handicrafts. Graciela has been working with Manuela Ramos for one year. With this loan of 1500 PEN, she will buy five mobile phones. She works with her assistants while her husband works in the city.

Her dream for the future is to increase her inventory of merchandise and improve her store. What she enjoys most about her Communal Bank are the meetings and the training she receives.

loans.use: Purchase five mobile phones

loans.name: Juan Carlos

texts.es:
JAUN CARLOS M. S. TRABAJA EN LA CIUDAD DE MANAGUA COMO MAESTRO DE OBRA TIENE MAS DE 26 AÑOS DE TRABAJAR EN ESA ACTIVIDAD, EL ES CASADO CON TRES HIJOS Y ESTOS TODABIA DE PENDEN DE EL Y SE ENCUENTRAN EN EL COLEGIO.
EL ACUDE A CEPRODEL PARA HACER UN PRESTAMO  PARA MEJORAMIENTO DE SU VIVIENDA VA ACOMPRAR MATERIALES  DE COSNTRUCCION COMO: ZINC, PERLINES Y PINTURA PARA EL TECHO DE SU CASA DE HABITACION.
HA TRABAJADO SIETE PRESTAMOS CON CEPRODEL Y ESTOS HAN SIDO PARA EL MEJRAMIENTO DE SU CASA DE HABITACION.
texts.en:
Juan Carlos M. S. works in the city of Managua as a master builder. He has more than 26 years of experience working in this trade. Juan Carlos is married and has three children in school who are still dependent on him.

He approached CEPRODEL to request a home improvement loan that will enable him to purchase construction materials such as zinc, crossbeams, and paint for the roof of his house. Juan Carlos has received seven loans from CEPRODEL which were used to make improvements to his home.

loans.use: Purchase construction materials for his roof

loans.name: Milena Patricia

texts.es: Milena A. vive en la ciudad de Cartagena y se dedica a la venta de productos cosméticos mediante revistas especializadas, así ella va donde todos sus clientes muestra su revista  y también los asesora respecto a que productos pueden usar de acuerdo a sus perfil o condiciones. Desde hace dos años se ha dedicado a este negocio y logró su vinculación a esta empresa que trabaja comercialmente a través de catálogos, por medio de una vecina y desde que inició sus primeras ventas  Milena empezó a gustarle esta actividad, porque le genera ingresos y se encontraba desempleada, porque como asistente administrativa no lograba ubicarse laboralmente.  Este es el primer financiamiento con la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo y también es su primer credikiva, con el comprará productos cosméticos como cremas, productos para el hogar, joyerías, productos de aseo personal, maquillajes y tratamientos faciales, para ampliar su mercado. Con este negocio ha logrado mejorar sus ingresos  y planea fortalecerlo mucho más,  porque su meta es convertirse en generadora de empleos a través de esta actividad para ver cumplir su sueño de viajar por todo el mundo y progresar .
texts.en:
Milena A. lives in the city of Cartagena and sells cosmetics through specialized catalogs that she presents to all of her customers. She also provides advice as to what products should be used based on a customer’s profile and conditions. Milena started her business two years ago when a neighbor convinced her to contact a company that sells through catalogs. After making her first sales, Milena enjoyed the work because of the income she generated since she was unemployed at the time. She had not been able to find a position as an administrative assistant.

This is her first loan with Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, as well as her first with Kiva. Milena will use the funds to buy cosmetic products such as crèmes, household products, jewelry, personal use products, make-up, and facial treatments to expand her inventory. She has already improved her income through her business and has plans to strengthen it even more. Her goal is to create jobs through her business because she dreams of traveling all over the world and making progress.

loans.use: Purchase cosmetics, household products, jewelry, personal use products, make-up, and facial treatments

loans.name: Isabel

texts.es:
Isabel es socia del Banco Comunal “Inka Wasi” ubicado en el distrito de Puno, provincia de Puno y departamento de Puno, tiene 31años de edad, de estado civil conviviente y tiene 01 hijo, la señora estudió educación secundaria. 
Ella se dedica a la venta de cosméticos, paralelamente elabora caritas (máscaras) que vende al por menor.
Es una socia nueva, ella solicita un préstamo inicial de S/. 300.00 nuevos soles, dinero que invertirá  en su negocio de venta de cosméticos, también comprará un quintal de harina y 10 bolsas de yeso para hacer caritas (mascaras), trabaja junto con su esposo y cuñada.
Su sueño es tener una casa propia y crecer más como empresaria.	
Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal es la organización y lo que ganan sus ahorros.
texts.en:
Isabel is a member of the Communal Bank “Inka Wasi” which is located in the District, Province, and Department of Puno. She is 31 years old, in a common law marriage, and has one child. Sra. Isabel studied for her high school education.

She sells cosmetics. In addition, she produces masks that she sells at retail. Isabel is a new member, so she is requesting her first loan in the amount of 300 PEN. The money will be invested in her business of selling cosmetics, but she will also buy a quintal (46 kg) of flour and 10 sacks of plaster for making masks. She works with her husband and sister-in-law.

Her dreams are to have her own house and continue growing as an entrepreneur. What she enjoys most about her Communal Bank are the organization and the interest she earns from her savings.

loans.use: Purchase cosmetics & supplies for making handcrafted masks

loans.name: Marco Antonio

texts.es:
Marco tiene 26 años de edad, es soltero y reside junto a su padre en el caserío Pedregal Bajo del distrito de Tambogrande un distrito agrícola que se encuentra ubicado en la Región de Piura, a más de cuatro horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Marco se dedica  a la crianza y venta de ovejas y cerdos, los cría encorrales situados cerca a su domicilio. El los alimenta de granos y pastos naturales, cuando ya han alcanzado un buen nivel de desarrollo los ofrece en venta a los negociantes que frecuentemente visitan la zona en donde reside. Adicionalmente trabaja vendiendo productos de omnilife en su domicilio a los vecinos o visitantes de la zona.

El desea adquirir alimento balanceado para ampliar su negocio, u productos omnilife para poder percibir mayores ingresos. Por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1000 nuevos soles que le ayuden a lograr su objetivo.

Marco es una persona bastante empeñosa y trabajadora, su mayor anhelo es seguir creciendo como empresario para poder mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Marco is 26 years old, single, and lives with his father in the village of Pedregal Bajo in the District of Tambogrande. This farming district is situated in Piura region and more than four hours away from the city of Chiclayo.

Marco raises and sells sheep and pigs. He keeps the animals in pens located near his home and feeds them grains and natural grasses. When the animals have reached the proper level of development, he offers them for sale to traders who frequently visit the area where he lives. In addition, he sells Omnilife products out of his home to neighbors and visitors to the area.

Marco wants to acquire balanced feed so that he can expand his business, as well as Omnilife products to help generate better earnings. For this reason, he is requesting a loan from Edpyme Alternativa in the amount of 1000 PEN to help him accomplish his goal.

Marco is a determined and hardworking individual. His greatest wish is to continue working as an entrepreneur so that he can improve his family’s quality of life.

loans.use: Purchase balanced feed for his animals

loans.name: Jose Manuel

texts.es: El señor José Manuel, tiene  38 años tiene 2 hijos menores de edad a su cargo. José se dedica a la venta de pan. Dio inicio a su negocio hace 2 años, el dio inicio debido a que el tenia problemas económicos pero su familia lo ayudo para que pudiera establecer un negocio y mantenerse ocupado. Por lo que es un hombre muy responsable y disfruta de su trabajo. El financiamiento será invertido en la compra de harina, cazuelas, huevo, mantequilla entre otros. El  sueño de él es mantenerse en el negocio, debido a que la competencia es bastante grande, además que desea invertir para terminar de construir su vivienda.
texts.en:
Sr. José Manuel is 38 years old and has two young children for whom he is responsible. He sells bread and has been in business for two years. José Manuel had financial problems when he first started, but with the support of his family he was able to establish his business and remain busy. He is a very responsible gentleman who enjoys his work.

This loan will be invested in the purchase of flour, pans, eggs, butter, and other items. His dream is to maintain his business because there is plenty of competition. In addition, he plans to invest in completing the construction of his home.

loans.use: Operating capital to buy flour, pans, eggs, butter, and other items

loans.name: Julio Cesar

texts.es: El sr Julio  labora como vigilante  es soltera, tiene siete persona a su cargo, es el quinto crédito que CEPRODEL le otorga, agradece las oportunidades que  le ha brindado esta institución, este  desembolso lo utilizare para compra de  materiales de construcción como bloque ,cemento, hierro, clavo, madera cinz, perlines , mano de obra para porche de  su vivienda
texts.en: Sr. Julio works as a security guard.  He is single and has seven people for whom he is responsible.  This is the fifth loan he has received from CEPRODEL.  He is grateful for the opportunities that CEPRODEL has provided and will use this loan to buy construction materials such as blocks, cement, iron, nails, wood, zinc, and crossbeams.  Julio will also pay for labor to build a porch for his home.

loans.use: Purchase construction materials & pay for labor to build a porch

loans.name: Liliana Veronica

texts.es:
Liliana es socia del Banco Comunal “Inka Wasi” ubicado en el distrito de Puno, provincia de Puno y departamento de Puno, tiene 30 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente y tiene 02 hijos que dependen económicamente de ella.  Estudio educación superior.
La señora viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace un año, su primer préstamo fue de S/. 300.00 nuevos soles, dinero que invirtió en su negocio venta de productos cosméticos.
Con éste préstamo de S/. 400.00 nuevos soles, comprará productos de belleza.  Su  esposo es docente.
Su sueño para el futuro es crecer más en el negocio  y tener una tiende de productos de belleza bien surtida.
Liliana manifiesta que gracias a Manuela Ramos ha podido acceder a un préstamo como mucha facilidad.
texts.en:
Liliana is a member of the Communal Bank “Inka Wasi” which is located in the District, Province, and Department of Puno. She is 30 years old, in a common law marriage, and has two children who are financially dependent on her. Liliana studied for her higher education.

She has been working with Manuela Ramos for one year. Her first loan was in the amount of 400 PEN and used for her business of selling cosmetics. With this loan of 400 PEN, Liliana will buy more beauty products. Her husband works as a teacher. Her dreams for the future include growing her business even more and having a store that is well-stocked with beauty products.

Liliana says she is grateful to Manuela Ramos for being able to access a loan with great ease.

loans.use: Purchase cosmetics

loans.name: Getsemani Group

texts.es: Francisca, Teresa y Blanca conforman el grupo solidario Getsemani. La señora Teresa tiene 62 años, es casada y tiene 4 hijos ya mayores de edad. La señora se dedica a la venta de carne en su casa de habitación, aunque también vende una parte en el mercadito. Su esposo ya está jubilado. La señora dio inicio con este negocio debido a que no podían subsistir con el negocio de su esposo. Ella desea invertir el crédito en la compra de mercaderías principalmente carne de cerdo y res. Francisca se dedica a la venta de frutas y verduras, las cuales distribuye en su tramo ubicado en el mercado El Mayoreo de Managua. Ella desea invertir este crédito en la compra de mercaderías para vender más y de estar manera incrementar sus ganancias. Blanca Lilliam tiene 53 años, es casada y tiene 4 hijos uno de los cuales es menor de edad. La señora se dedica al comercio y elaboración de tortillas y tamales los cuales distribuye de manera ambulante. Ella inicio este negocio con el objetivo de incrementar los ingresos familiares buscando como apoyar a su esposo para sufragar los gastos del hogar. Desea este crédito para invertirlo en la compra de materia prima para la elaboración de tortillas.
texts.en:
Francisca, Teresa, and Blanca make of the solidarity group “Getsamani” (Gethsemane). Sra. Teresa is 62 years old, married, and has four adult children. She sells meat from her home and also sells some of it at a small market. Her husband is already retired. Sra. Teresa started this business because her family could not survive on her husband’s business. She wants to invest her loan in the purchase of merchandise, mainly pork and beef.

Francisca sells fruits and vegetables from her stand at the wholesale market in Managua. She wants to invest this loan in the purchase more merchandise to sell so that she can increase her revenues.

Blanca Lilliam is 53 years old, married, and four children, one of whom is a minor. She works as a merchant, making tortillas and tamales and then selling them as a street vendor. Blanca started this business so that she can increase her family income so as to help her husband cover the household expenses. She wants to invest this loan in the purchase of supplies for making tortillas.

loans.use: Operating capital to buy pork & beef

loans.name: Reynaldo Antonio

texts.es:
REYNALDO ANTONIO L. A. ES DE LA CIUDAD DE MANAGUA TRABAJA COMO GUARDA DE SEGURIDAD DESDE HACE VEINTE AÑOS, EL ES PADRE DE FAMILIA DE DOS HIJOS Y ESTOS SOLO DEPENDE DE EL UNO.
EL ACUDE NUEVAMENTE A CEPRODEL PARA SOLICITAR NUEVO PRESTAMO PARA LA COMPRA DE MATERIALES DE CONSTRUCCION PARA EL MEJORAMIENTO DE SU CASA DE HABITACION COMO: PISO, CEMENTO, ARENA PARA SU CASA DE HABITACION.
HA TRABAJADO CINCO PRESTAMOS CON CEPRODEL Y ESTOS HAN SIDO PARA EL MEJORAMIENTO DE SU CASA DE HABITACION.
texts.en: Reynaldo Antonio L. A. is from the city of Managua.  He has worked as a security guard for 20 years.  He is a father of two children that depend on him.  He is coming back to CEPRODEL to request a new loan to buy construction materials to improve his home, such as cement and sand for the floor of his house.  He has worked with CEPRODEL for 5 loans and they have all been to improve his home.

loans.use: To buy construction materials.

loans.name: Lucila

texts.es:
Lucila es socia del Banco Comunal “Inka Wasi” ubicado en el distrito D. Puno, provincia D. Puno y departamento D. Puno, tiene 56 años D. edad, D. estado civil casada y tiene 05 hijos (04 dependientes y 01 independientes), la señora solo estudió educación primaria. 
Trabaja con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desD. hace cuatro años, su primer préstamo fue D. S/. 300.00 nuevos soles, dinero que invirtió en su negocio venta D. prendas D. vestir.
Solicitará un nuevo crédito por la suma D. S/. 1000.00 nuevos soles, dinero que utilizará para comprar casacas, chompas, mantas,  seis juegos D. polleras y otros. Lucila  trabaja sola, su esposo es músico 
Su sueño para el futuro es crecer en el negocio y mejorar sus ganancias.	
Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal es la puntualidad y lo que gana sus ahorros.
texts.en:
Lucila is a member of the communal bank, "Inka Wasi" located in the district of Puno, a Puno province in the Puno section.  She is 56 years old and is married with 5 children (4 are dependent on her and 1 is independent).  Lucila only completed elementary education and has been working with the Manuela Ramos Movement for the last 4 years.  Her first loan was of 300.00 neuvos soles, money which she invested in her clothing business.  She is soliciting a new loan of 1000.00 nuevos soles, money she will be using to purchase: jackets, sweaters, blankets, 6 sets of skirts and other things. Lucila works alone, her husband is a musician.
Her future dreams are to grow the business and improve her earnings.
What she likes about her communal bank is the punctuality and what she gains from the savings.

loans.use: Purchase jackets, sweaters, blankets, and 6 sets of skirts, and other things.

loans.name: Jefry

texts.es: Jefry S. de 19 años de edad, es un joven entusiasta y con mucho empeño por los estudios que hoy en día realiza, el estudia gastronomia y va cursando ya el 5to ciclo de 6, por lo cual esta a puertas de culmitar sus estudios, Jefry decide estudiar  gastronomia  a raíz  que siempre le ha gustado la cocina y la preparacion de platos tipicos de la region, al culminar sus estudios le gustaria especializarse en comida peruana. En el futuro le gustaria poder trabajar en cruceros y luego, después de ver alcanzado experiencia en al cocina le gustaria abrir su propio restaurante de comidas internacionales. Con el reciente préstamo lo invertirá en el pago de sus estudios para asi poder culminar de estudiar con éxito y con prometedoras calificaciones que le aseguren un puesto de trabajo estable en el futuro.
texts.en: Jefry S., 19, is an enthusiastic young man who is very dedicated to his current studies. He is studying gastronomy/culinary arts and is in his 5th of 6 semesters which means he is just about finished with his studies. Jefry decided to study gastronomy because he has always enjoyed cooking and preparing typical regional dishes. Upon completing his studies he would like to specialize in Peruvian food. In the future he would like to be able to work on cruise ships and then, after getting experience in the kitchen, would like to open his own restaurant which will serve international cuisine. He will use his loan to pay for his studies so that he can successfully finish with promising skills that will ensure him a a stable job in the future.

loans.use: pay for school

loans.name: Ivan

texts.es:
Ivan tiene 29 años de edad, es soltero y residecon sus padres en el caserío San Pablo, en el distrito de Tambogrande, una zona agrícola que se encuentra situada en la provincia de Piura, en la región del mismo nombre, a más de cuatro horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo, capital de la región Lambayeque

Se dedica a trabajar en labores asociadas a la agricultura desde hace más de dos años, en un terreno de cultivo herencia de su padre siembra limón que cosecha semanalmente con el que cuenta, adicionalmente conduce una mototaxi ofreciendo servicio de transporte a sus vecinos y visitantes de la zona.

Ivan desea adquirir fertilizantes y pesticidas para brindar mantenimiento a su cultivo de limón con la finalidad de mejorar su producto y venderlo a mejor precio, con esta acción el espera obtener una buena cosecha. Por ello se ha visto en la necesidad de solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1000 nuevos soles.

Ivan  es una persona bastante tranquila y responsable. Su mayor anhelo es poder crecer como empresario y salir adelante.
texts.en:
Ivan is 29 years, single, and lives with his parents in the town of San Pablo, in the district of Tambogrande, an agricultural region in the province of Piura, more than four hours from the city of Chiclayo, the capital of the Lambayeque region.

He has worked in agriculture for more than two years on a plot of land he inherited from his father. He grows lemons and harvests every week. He also drives a taxi and offers his transportation services to his neighbors and to people visiting the area.

Ivan wants to purchase fertilizers and pesticides to maintain his lemon crop and improve his produce in order to sell it at a higher price. He hopes this will allow him to obtain a better crop. For this reason he has asked Edpyme Alternativa for a loan of 1,000 nuevos soles.

Ivan is a very laid-back and responsible person. His greatest desire is to grow as an entrepreneur and to get ahead in life.

loans.use: Fertilizer and pesticide for his crops

loans.name: Félix Humberto

texts.es: El  Sr M.   labora como conductor es casado tiene cuatro persona a su cargo, es el cuarto crédito que CEPRODEL le otorga, agradece las oportunidad que  le han brindado por que así a podido realizar mejora de su vivienda, deuda que tenia con otras instituciones por los interese que  era muy alto ,con este  desembolso lo utilizare para solventa deuda
texts.en: Mr. M. has worked as a driver. He is married and has four people in charge. This is the fourth loan granted by CEPRODEL, and he appreciates the opportunity they have given him to be able to improve his home. The debt he had with other institutions had very high interests. He will use this loan to settle the other debts.

loans.use: He needs to consolidate his debts and make home improvements.

loans.name: Magdalena

texts.es:
Magdalena es socia del Banco Comunal “Las Collabinas” ubicado en el distrito de Ilave, provincia El Collao y departamento de Puno, tiene 59 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente,  tiene 03 hijos (02 independientes),  por diversos motivos  la señora no llegó a estudiar. 
Trabaja con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace un año, su primer préstamo fue de S/. 500.00 nuevos soles, dinero que invirtió en su negocio de venta de ganados ovinos, vacunos y llamas.
Con éste préstamo de S/. 1500.00 nuevos soles, comprará tres ovejas y alpacas, trabaja junto con su esposo e hijos. Paralelamente trabajan en la chacra.
Su sueño es tener ganados mejorados para venderlos a más precio y obtener mejores ingresos.
Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal es la facilidad del préstamo y la puntualidad.
texts.en:
Magdalena is a member of “Las Collabinas” community bank located in the district of Ilave, part of the province of El Collao and department of Puno.
She is 59 years old, married, and has three children (of whom two are independent). For various reasons she did not attend school.

A year ago she worked with the Manuela Ramos Movement, and was granted her first loan of 500 new soles, which she invested in her business of selling sheep, cattle and llamas. With this loan of 1,500 new soles, she will buy three sheep and alpacas, and work with her husband and children. In parallel they also work on the farm.

Her dream is to have improved cattle to sell for a higher price and earn a better income. What she likes about the community bank is the ease and punctuality of its loan service.

loans.use: she will buy three sheep and alpacas

loans.name: G.s. Bendicion De Dios Group

texts.es: La señora Mercedes tiene 27 años, es casada y tiene un hijo de un año de edad. La señora se dedica a la venta de cosméticos de manera ambulante y principalmente por encargos es que realiza sus ventas. Ella se dedica a esta actividad primeramente debido a la falta de empleo que aqueja a nuestro país, ya que no tuvo la oportunidad de poder culminar sus estudios. Su esposo trabaja como guarda de seguridad en Managua. Ella está solicitando este crédito con el objetivo de invertirlo en comprar mas mercaderías teniendo como objetivo el incrementar sus ventas.  Otra integrante de este grupo es doña Julia, la cual tiene 46 años de edad, es casada y tiene dos hijos de 18 y 22 años de edad respectivamente. Ella se dedica a la venta de cosméticos, principalmente trabaja con productos distribuidos por Avon de manera ambulante, tanto al crédito como al contado. Ella inicio con este negocio debido a la necesidad de generar un ingreso extra para la familia ya que el ingreso de su esposo no es suficiente para los gastos del hogar. La señora desea continuar invirtiendo en la compra de cosméticos y realizar inversiones en otros productos aprovechando que se acerca la época de verano.
texts.en:
Mercedes, 27, is married and has a one year old son.  She’s an itinerant cosmetics saleswoman.  Her sales are primarily order based.  She is in this line of work primarily because of the lack of employment opportunities in our country since she was unable to finish her schooling.  Her husband’s employed as a Security Guard in Managua. She is asking for this loan to buy more merchandise with the objective of increasing sales.

Another group member is Julia, 46.  She’s married and has two children who are 18 and 22 years of age respectively.  She sells cosmetics, mostly Avon products, door to door, both for cash and on credit.  She started the business because of the need to generate extra family income because her husband’s income was insufficient to cover household expenses.  She wants to continue investing in the purchase of cosmetics and invest in other products to take advantage of the summer season.

loans.use: To buy cosmetics and other products.

loans.name: Maria Elena

texts.es:
María es socia del Banco Comunal “Inka Wasi” ubicado en el distrito de Puno, provincia de Puno y departamento de Puno, tiene 32 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente y tiene 03 hijos, la señora estudió educación superior (incompleto). 
La señora trabaja con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace ocho meses, su primer préstamo fue de S/. 500.00 nuevos soles, dinero que invirtió en su negocio venta de abarrotes.
Con éste préstamo de S/. 300.00 nuevos soles, comprará dos sacos de arroz y azúcar.  En su negocio la ayudan su esposo y su mamá.
Su sueño es crecer en el negocio, tener una tienda más grande para abastecerse con más productos.	
Le que gusta de su banco comunal es la organización y la puntualidad.
texts.en:
Maria is a member of the Inka Wasi communal bank in the Puno district, Puno province, Puno department.  She is 32, has a common-law husband, and 3 children.  Maria didn’t finish high school.

She has worked with the Manuela Ramos Movement for the past eight months.  Her first loan was for 500 new sols and she used the money for her grocery  business.
With this loan of 300 new sols, she will buy two sacks of rice and sugar.  Her husband and her mother help her with her business.
Her dream is for her business to grow, and to have a larger store supplied with more products.
What she likes about the communal bank is its organization and punctuality.

loans.use: To buy two sacks of rice and sugar

loans.name: Micaela Bastidas Ii Group

texts.es: María Elena es la presidenta del grupo Micaela Bastida II, conformado por  8 personas. Este grupo comienza a dar marcha hace ya 3 años, llevan el nombre de Micaela Bastidas II debido a viven en la misma zona. María Elena tiene 46 años de edad soltera y con un hijo aun menor de edad,  ella sale adelante cada día dándole empeño y esmero a la sastrería que tiene como fuente de ingresos. Ella comenzó con este negocio propio a raíz que no tenía con quien dejar al cuidado a su menor hijo, es así como surge este pequeña sastrería en su casa,  que día a día crece cada vez mas. El presente préstamo lo invertirá en compras de telas para la confección de uniformes escolares. para el bienestar de su familia.
texts.en:
The group Micaela Bastidas II is made up of 8 people that know how to do business nowadays.  This group was started 3 years ago and was named Micaela Bastidas II because all the members live in the same district.  These are women who work hard to get ahead without letting the obstacles in their path stop them.  One of these women is María Elena, the president of the group.  She is 46 years old, single and has one minor child.  She works every day with commitment and dedication to her profession as a seamstress, her source of income.  She started a small shop in her house because she didn't have anyone to care for her young son.  Her business grows more each day.  

She will use the current loan to purchase fabric to make school uniforms.  María Elena is only one of the 8 members that work arduously and enthusiastically for their own well being and that of their families.

loans.use: To purchase fabric to make school uniforms

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Purchase construction supplies to fix a leaking roof

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Nicasia

texts.es:
Nicasia es socia del Banco Comunal “Inka Wasi” ubicado en el distrito de Puno, provincia de Puno y departamento de Puno, tiene 55 años de edad, de estado civil casada y tiene 04 hijos (2 independiente).  La señora estudio educación secundaria. 
Trabaja con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace cuatro años, su primer préstamo fue de S/. 300.00 nuevos soles, dinero que invirtió en su negocio de venta de prendas de vestir como buzos, chompas y otros.
Con éste crédito de S/. 400.00 nuevos soles, comprará dos docenas de ropa de lencería, medias y ropas para niños.  Trabaja sola, su esposo es docente.
Su sueño es tener una tienda grande de prendas de vestir de todo tipo.	
Lo que le gusta de su Banco Comunal son las reuniones y la facilidad de los préstamos.
texts.en:
Nicasia is a member of the Communal Bank “Inka Wasi” which is located in the District, Province, and Department of Puno. She is 55 years old, married, and has four children (two of whom are independent). Nicasia studied for her high school education.

She has worked with Manuela Ramos for four years. Her first loan was in the amount of 300 PEN. The money was invested in her business of selling clothes such as sweatshirts, sweaters, and other items.

With this loan of 400 PEN, Nicasia will buy two dozen lingerie garments, stockings, and children’s clothing. She works alone and her husband is employed as a teacher. Her dream is to have a large store where she offers all types of clothing. What she enjoys most about her Communal Bank are the meetings and the convenience of the loans.

loans.use: Purchase two dozen lingerie garments, stockings, and children’s clothing

loans.name: Rafaela Carolina

texts.es: La sra S.   labora como colector  es soltera, es el quinto crédito que CEPRODEL le otorga, agradece las oportunidades que  le han dado esta institución, este  desembolso lo utilizare para compra de cinz, perlines , mano de obra para entechar su vivienda
texts.en: Mrs. S. is single and works as a collector. This is the fifth loan that CEPRODEL has given her. She is very thankful to the institution for the opportunities it has provided her with. The amount will be used to buy zinc, beams and labour to roof her home.

loans.use: Home improvements, purchase building materials.

loans.name: Sara

texts.es:
Sara es socia del Banco Comunal “Las Collabinas” ubicado en el distrito de Ilave, provincia El Collao y departamento de Puno, tiene 26 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente,  tiene 03 hijos.  La señora estudio educación secundaria. 
Trabaja con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace ocho meses,  su primer préstamo fue de S/. 500.00 nuevos soles, dinero que invirtió en su negocio de venta de animales caseros y carne en general.
Con éste crédito de S/. 100.00 nuevos soles, comprará un degollado de carne de alpaca.
Sara trabaja junto con su esposo, quien esporádicamente viaja fuera del país a trabajar.
Su sueño es tener construida su casa y que sus hijos sean profesionales.	
Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal es la puntualidad y lo que gana su ahorro.
texts.en:
Sara is a member of the Communal Bank “Las Collabinas” which is located in the District of Ilave, El Collao Province, Department of Puno. She is 26 years old, in a common law marriage, and has three children. Sara studied for her high school education.

She started working with Manuela Ramos eight months ago. Her first loan was in the amount of 500 PEN. The money was invested in her business of selling domesticated animals and meat.

With this loan of 100 PEN, she will purchase an alpaca carcass for its meat. Sara works with her husband, who sporadically travels outside the country for his job. Her dreams include building a house and seeing her children become professionals. What she enjoys most about her Communal Bank are the punctuality and the interest she earns from her savings.

loans.use: Purchase an alpaca carcass for its meat

loans.name: Gertrudis Francisco

texts.es:
GERTRUDIS FRANCISCO G. TRABAJA COMO VIJILANTE DE SEGURIDAD, ES PADRE DE FAMILIA DE TRES HIJOS Y ESTOS SE ENCUENTRAN A CARGO DE EL Y ESWTAN EN EDAD ESCOLAR.
EL HA TRABAJADO TRECE PRESTAMOS CON CEPRODEL Y ESTOS HAN SIDO PARA EL MEJORAMIENTO DE SU VIVIENDA, EL ACUDE NUEVAMENTE A CEPRODEL PARA HACER UN NUEVO PRESTAMO PARA LA COMPRA DE MATERIALES DE CONSTRUCCION COMO: PERSIANAS, DOS VENTANAS DE MADERA Y VERJAS PARA LAS VENTANAS Y DOS PORTONES DE HIERRO PARA SU CASA DE HABITACION. EL DICE QUE GRACIAS A LOS PRESTAMOS CON CEPRODEL HA PODIDO MEJORAR SU CASITA Y AHORA ESTA MAS SEGURA.
texts.en: Gertrudis Francisco G. works as security guard. He is a family man with three children, all of school age and in his care. He has obtained 13 loans from CEPRODEL to improve his home. This time he is going once more to CEPRODEL to request a new loan for the purchase of building materials such as blinds, two wooden windows, grilles for the windows and two iron gates for his home. He says that thanks to the CEPRODEL loans he has been able to improve his house and that it's much safer now.

loans.use: Buy building materials

loans.name: Judith Saturnina

texts.es:
Judith es socia del Banco Comunal “Inka Wasi” ubicado en el distrito de Puno, provincia de Puno y departamento de Puno, tiene 33 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente y tiene 04 hijos.  La señora estudio educación superior. 
Trabaja con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace tres años, su primer préstamo fue de S/. 300.00 nuevos soles, dinero que invirtió en su negocio de venta de abarrotes y venta de lentes.
Solicitará un nuevo crédito por la suma de S/. 800.00 nuevos soles, dinero que utilizará para comprar un saco de arroz, azúcar, cuatro cajas de golosinas y otros productos.  Ella recibe la ayuda de su esposo.
Su sueño es tener un minimarket bien abastecido, con ello obtendría mayores ganancias.	
Lo que le gusta de su Banco Comunal es la puntualidad, la alegría entre las socias y lo que gana su ahorro.
texts.en:
Judith is a member of the Communal Bank “Inka Wasi” which is located in the District, Province, and Department of Puno. She is 33 years old, in a common law marriage, and has four children. Judith studied for her higher education.

She has worked with Manuela Ramos for three years. Her first loan was in the amount of 300 PEN.

Judith is requesting a new loan for 800 PEN. The money will be used to buy one sack of rice, sugar, four boxes of candy, and other products. She has the support of her husband. Her dream is to have a minimarket that is well-stocked so that she can generate better earnings. What she enjoys most about her Communal Bank are the punctuality, the cheerfulness expressed among its members, and the interest she earns from her savings.

loans.use: Purchase one sack of rice, sugar, four boxes of candy, and other products

loans.name: Guillermo Nicanor

texts.es:
Guillermo de 45 años, es vendedor de pescado porque desde pequeño empezó a trabajar en el mercado de caraguay (mercado de mariscos). Poco a poco incremento sus ventas ya que se independizo. 

En la actualidad trabaja con ayuda de su esposa desde las 07h00am hasta las 12h00 todos los días. Vende pescados llamados albacoras, picudo, corvina la libra aproximada desde $ 2.50. Uno de los inconvenientes al realizar su trabajo es vende en la calle ya que es comerciante ambulante y en ocasiones tiene problemas con los metropolitanos. 

En el futuro tiene muchas aspiraciones para su negocio pero por ahora quiere comprar con el préstamo materiales de construcción para su vivienda como cemento, arena, bloques. Y asi darle un buen futuro a sus hijos (aparecen en la foto).
texts.en:
Guillermo is 45 years old and, from a very early age, has been selling fish at the market in Caraguay (seafood market).  He was able to increase sales and gradually became independent.

With the help of his wife he now works from 7:00 a.m. to 12:00 noon every day.  He sells tuna, picudo fish, and sea bass for approximately $2.50 a pound.  One of the inconveniences of his job is that he sells in the streets and sometimes runs into difficulties in the metropolitan areas.

He hopes to be able to increase his business in the future but for now wants to use the loan to buy construction materials such as cement, sand and bricks for his home.  In this way he can provide a better future for his sons (shown in the photo).

loans.use: To buy cement, sand and bricks

loans.name: Victoria

texts.es:
Victoria es socia del Banco Comunal “Las Collabinas” ubicado en el distrito de Ilave, provincia El Collao y departamento de Puno, tiene 29 años de edad, de estado civil soltera, estudió educación superior. 
Con su primer préstamo solicitado, que fue de S/.300.00 nuevos soles, invirtió en su negocio de venta de prendas de vestir para niños.  Trabaja con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace un año.
Con éste crédito de S/. 100.00 nuevos soles, dinero comprará prendas de vestir.
Su sueño es crecer en el negocio y tener una tienda de ropa de toda clase.	
Lo que le gusta de su Banco Comunal es la puntualidad, responsabilidad y lo que gana sus ahorros.
texts.en:
Victoria is a member of the "Las Collabinas" communal bank which is located in the province of El Collao in the department of Puno.  She is 29 years old, single and has a high school education.

She invested her first 300 PEN loan in her children's clothing business.  She has been working with the Manuela Ramos Movement for a year now.

She plans to use the new 100 PEN loan to buy more clothing.  Her dream is to grow her business and have her own clothing store one day.

She likes the communal bank because it is punctual and dependable and helps her earn more with her savings.

loans.use: To buy clothing

loans.name: Virginia

texts.es:
Virginia es socia del Banco Comunal “Inka Wasi”, ubicado en el distrito de Puno, provincia de Puno y departamento de Puno, tiene 49 años de edad, de estado civil casada y tiene 02 hijos.  La señora estudio hasta 5to de educación secundaria. 
Trabaja con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace dos años, su primer préstamo fue de S/. 500.00 nuevos soles, dinero que invirtió en su estudio contable.
Con este crédito de S/. 800.00 nuevos soles, comprará materiales de escritorio, muebles, papeles y otros para su estudio contable.  Ella trabaja junto con su esposo y su hijo.
Su sueño para el futuro es tener un restaurant y así mejorar sus ingresos.	
Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal es la unión,  la puntualidad, responsabilidad y la facilidad del préstamo.
texts.en:
Virginia is a member of the "Inka Wasi" communal bank in the district, province and department of Puno.  She is 49 years old, married and has two children.  She studied up until the 5th level of secondary education.

She has been working with the Manuela Ramos Movement for two years.  Her first loan in the amount of 500 PEN was invested in her accounting service.

She plans to use the new 800 PEN loan to buy writing materials, furniture, paper and other materials for her business.  She works with her husband and a son.

Her dream for the future is to open a restaurant and increase her income.  She likes the communal bank because of its union, punctuality and dependability and the ease of getting a loan.

loans.use: To buy writing materials, furniture, paper and other materials for her accounting office

loans.name: Teofilo

texts.es:
TEOFILO O. R. TRABAJA COMO VIJILANTE DE SEGURIDAD, ES PADRE DE FAMILIA DE TRES HIJOS PERO ESTOS YA NO ESTAN A SU CARGO.
  EL HA TRABAJADO DIEZ PRESTAMOS CON CEPRODEL Y ESTOS HAN SIDO PARA EL MEJORAMIENTO DE SU VIVIENDA, EL ACUDE NUEVAMENTE A CEPRODEL PARA HACER UN NUEVO PRESTAMO PARA LA COMPRA DE MATERIALES DE CONSTRUCCION COMO: PINTURA, ZINC, PERLINES Y CLAVOS PARA EL TECHO DE SU CASA YA QUE ESTE PARA INVIERNO EL AGUA SE PASA.
 EL DICE QUE GRACIAS A LOS PRESTAMOS CON CEPRODEL HA PODIDO MEJORAR SU CASITA Y AHORA SU FAMILIA CUENTA CON MEJORES CONDICIONES DE VIVIENDA
texts.en:
Teófilo O. Ramírez works as security guard. He is a family man with three children but they are no longer dependent on him. He has received 10 previous loans with CEPRODEL for the improvement of his home. He is going to CEPRODEL once more to request a new loan to buy building materials such as paint, zinc, beams and nails for the roof of his house, because this winter water was leaking. 

He says that thanks to the CEPRODEL loans he has been able to improve his home and now his family is enjoying better living conditions.

loans.use: Buy building materials.

loans.name: Yaneth Rocio

texts.es:
Yaneth es socia del Banco Comunal “Inka Wasi”, ubicado en el distrito de Puno, provincia de Puno y departamento de Puno, tiene 20 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente y tiene 01 hijo.  La señora estudió educación superior incompleto. 
Trabaja con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace cuatro meses, su primer préstamo fue de S/. 300.00 nuevos soles, dinero que invirtió en su negocio de venta de prendas de vestir y otros productos.
Con éste crédito de S/. 300.00 nuevos soles, comprará cuatro cajas de shampoo.  Ella recibe el apoyo y ayuda su esposo, quien también trabaja como chofer.
Su sueño es tener un capital propio para hacer crecer su negocio y terminar de estudiar.	
Le que gusta de su Banco Comunal es la facilidad con la que la que le otorgan los préstamos.
texts.en:
Yaneth is a member of the "Inka Wasi" communal bank which is located in the district, province and department of Puno.  She is 20 years old and has a common-law husband and a son.  She was unable to complete her secondary education.

She has worked with the Manuela Ramos Movement for four months.  She invested her first loan of 300 PEN in her business selling clothing and other products.

She plans to use the new 300 PEN loan to buy four cases of shampoo.  She receives support and help from her husband who works as a driver.

Her dream is to have her own capital so she can increase her business and finish her education.

She likes the communal bank because of how easy it is to get a loan there.

loans.use: To buy four cases of shampoo

loans.name: Melania De Jesús

texts.es:
La señora Melania de Jesús M. tiene su negocio en un municipio de nombre Masaya, del Departamento de Masaya en el que ya lleva trece años de tenerlos con el cual ella ha sacado adelante a sus hijos ya que como hace unos dieciséis años el esposo falleció y con el sudor de su frente  ha sacado adelante a sus hijos quienes ahora ya están empezando a convertirse también en comerciantes, la actividad a la que se dedica es venta de Fritanga, sopa los días Lunes y tiene una pequeña pulpería que está iniciando y que a medida que se le ha financiado la ha incrementado.

Actualmente es viuda, solo depende un hijo de ella y una nieta que es la única que tiene, en estos momentos la señora solicita un crédito a CEPRODEL con el fin de comprar los siguientes productos: Pollo, queso, cerdo, maduro, plátano, arroz, aceite, salsa inglesa, harina, frijoles, carne de res y azúcar.

Cabe mencionar que esto lo utilizará para la venta de la comida y con la ganancia seguir invirtiendo más en su pulpería.
texts.en:
Melania de Jesús M. has had a business in the town of Masaya in the department of Masaya for 13 years.  With this business, she has improved the lives of her children since her husband died 16 years ago.  With the sweat of her brow, she has brought up her children who are beginning to also become merchants.  Melania sells fritanga soup on Mondays and also has a small grocery store that is just starting but as it has been financed, it has been growing.  

She is a widow and has a son and granddaughter who depend on her.  She is asking for a loan with Ceprodel to purchase the following products: chicken, cheese, pork, plantains, bananas, rice, oil, Worcestershire sauce, flour, beans, beef, and sugar.  

She will use these products in her food sales, and use the income to invest more in the grocery store.

loans.use: Purchase ingredients for her food sales

loans.name: Ondina De Los Ángeles

texts.es: En la ciudad de Masaya del Departamento de Masaya, tiene un negocio de taller de Zapatería la señora Ondina de los Angeles
texts.en: Mrs. Ondina de los Ángeles

loans.use: To buy patent leather, yellow and white glue, Bontex cushioned insoles, and soles.

loans.name: Maria Cleotilde

texts.es:
Maria tiene 47 años de edad, es casada  y vive junto a su esposo y  su hijo en el caserío CP ubicado en el distrito de las Lomas, una zona agrícola que se encuentra situada en la provincia de Piura, en la región del mismo nombre, a más de cuatro horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo, capital de la región Lambayeque.

Se dedica a la venta de prendas de vestir en general, en diferentes variedades. Ella ofrece estos productos tanto al crédito como al contado y los ofrece principalmente entre sus vecinos y conocidos. Adicionalmente ella vende bebidas como cerveza y chicha de jora que ella misma elabora. Estas actividades son de mucha ayuda para la economía de su familia y se vale de ella para ayudar al mantenimiento de su economía diaria.

María desea adquirir más mercadería para ampliar su negocio, mejoramiento y arreglo de su local de trabajo y durante esta temporada la demanda por su negocio aumenta, ya que no hay ninguna competencia en la zona.  Por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1000 nuevos soles que le ayuden a realizar su objetivo.

María es una joven bastante trabajadora y empeñosa, las personas que le conocen admiran sus ganas de salir adelante y progresar.
texts.en:
Maria is 47 years old, married, and she lives together with her husband and son in the community of CP, located in the district of Las Lomas, an agricultural region of the province of Piura. It is located more than four hours from the city of Chiclayo, capital city of Lambayeque. 

She sells general clothing of different varieties. She sells her products on credit and in cash.  She sells primarily to her neighbors and friends. She also sells drinks, including beer and chicha de jora (a local fermented drink) that she makes herself. These businesses are a great source of help for her family and to provide for her daily needs. 

Maria wishes to purchase more merchandise to expand her business, to improve and renovate her work space and to be able to meet the increased demand during this season, especially because there is no competition in her area. In order to meet her objective she has approached Edpyme Alternativa (Kiva Field Partner) for a loan in the amount of 1000 nuevos soles.

Maria is a young woman who is very hard working and intent on her goals. Those who know her admire her personal wish to come out ahead and for progress.

loans.use: To purchase more merchandise.

loans.name: Ronaldo Delgadillo

texts.es:
En el municipio de Granada, Departamento de Granada, labora el señor Ronaldo Delgadillo el cual tiene 28 años de laborar en una empresa ubicada en la misma zona. Es soltero y solamente dependen de él tres personas, su mamá y dos hermanos que tiene que aún no trabajan.

Actualmente tiene la necesidad de realizar mejoramiento de vivienda en su casa de habitación y por tal razón visita las oficinas de CEPRODEL para realizar dicho mejoramiento y también cancelar unas deudas que tiene para estar libre y de esta forma darle un hogar saludable a su mamá ya que no quiere que en la temporada de invierno tengan problemas. Con el crédito logrará comprar los materiales de construcción que le permitirán llevar a cabo su obra de construcción para beneficio familiar.
texts.en:
Ronaldo Delgadillo M., has 28 years of experience and works as a Chief Technician for a firm located in the town of Granada, Granada department.  He’s single and has three dependents: his mother and two siblings that don’t work yet.

He needs to do some home improvements so he visited CEPRODEL’s offices to accomplish said improvements as well as to pay off some debts he has so as to be free from them and provide his mother with a healthy home because he doesn’t want them to have any problems during the winter season. With this loan he will be able to purchase construction materials that will allow him to perform construction works that will benefit his family.

loans.use: For home improvements and to pay off a debt

loans.name: Alberto José

texts.es:
En el municipio de Granada, Departamento de Granada, labora el señor Alberto José S. , el cual tiene 17 años de laborar como Operador de Pozo en una empresa ubicada en la misma zona. Es acompañado solo depende tres personas, su esposa y dos hijos que están en edad escolar.

Actualmente tiene la necesidad de realizar mejoramiento de vivienda en su casa de habitación y por tal razón visita las oficinas de CEPRODEL para realizar dicho mejoramiento y también cancelar unas deudas que tiene para estar libre y de esta forma darle un hogar digno a su familia ya que quiere que ellos crezcan saludablemente.
texts.en:
Mr. Alberto José S. has worked as a Well Operator in the town of Granada, Granada department for 17 years.  He has three people with him: his wife and two school age children.

He needs to do some home improvements so visited CEPRODEL’s offices to do said improvements and also to pay off some debts he has in order to be free from them and provide his family with a worthy home because he wants them to grow healthfully.
